title: PALAIS MEHDI
address: Palmeraie de Marrakech Circuit de la palmeraie, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: See why so many travelers make Palais Mehdi their small hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Nearby landmarks such as La Palmeraie (1.9 mi) and Gueliz (2.0 mi) make Palais Mehdi Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the small hotel.Palais Mehdi features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Palais Mehdi, free parking is available.Marrakech has plenty of French restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Le Blokk, Le Zinc, and Restaurant Dar Khmissa Plazza, which are serving up some great dishes.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences, or Heritage Museum, which are popular history museums amongst tourists.At Palais Mehdi, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

title: RIAD 11 ZITOUNE
address: Rue Riad Zitoune Lakdim Derb Lakhdar No11, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,
Description: In the heart of the Medina, conveniently located simply a 100 metres away from the very famous Jemaa El Fna Square and marketplace, you will find our oasis of relaxation which is under German Management. Our luxurious and authentic riad has recently been refurbished with the modern conveniences, whilst keeping key period features true to the neighbourhood it calls home, Zitoune. Let your senses be awakened and lead you into the old Marrakesh of 1,001 Nights. Riad Zitoune is a place of tranquil escape where one can rest before exploring one of the most exotic cities of Africa. We hope that you will be inspired and revitalised by our riad's surroundings, and all that it has to offer. Our riad was owned by a spice trader's family and used as one of their trading houses. Inside and out the house has been furnished with love and great attention to detail to maintain its splendid authenticity, whilst the furniture is a mix of antique Arabic collectibles entwined into modern design. Precious fabrics, harmonious music of the setting and atmospheric accents created with light and decoration will leave you feeling revitalised from the beautiful interior and exterior of our house. Culinary delicacies coupled with exceptional service complement the unique surroundings of the riad. You will enjoy a breakfast to the song of the birds in the morning on our comfortable rooftop terrace, after which you are invited to browse our library and get lost in a book whilst listening to the sounds of our water fountain on the patio. Or, at night you can lose yourself in a cup of delicious mint tea under a star-filled sky in our lounge corner on the rooftop terrace. Available to all guests is the library with selected literary works, WiFi in each guest room as well as in the communal areas, and iPads are available on request for guest usage. We also offer spa treatments such as massages and Hammam as well as snacks, lunch, and dinner to accompany the experience. Come to an exceptional place, where you can escape the hectic of the Medina, where your senses can rest and you can let the stresses of daily life behind...

title: RESIDENCE EZZAHIA
address: Boulevard Abdelkrim Al Khattabi, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Pointbar,Kech Burger,La Cuisine de Mona,Bombay Marrakech,
near_att: Marrakech Urban Adventures,Le Pingouin Du Desert,Le Bar Marrakech,Kech Vr,
Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Residence Ezzahia, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep. Residence Ezzahia is a budget friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and a kitchenette in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests. The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and a lounge, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available. While staying at Residence Ezzahia Hotel, visitors can check out Marrakech Train Station (1.1 mi) and Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam (1.8 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Residence Ezzahia Hotel, including Al Fassia (0.4 mi), Azar (0.7 mi), and La Trattoria Marrakech (0.5 mi). During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jardin Majorelle (1.0 mi) and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret (0.8 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Residence Ezzahia as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: RIAD SUN OF KECH
address: Diour Jdad no 146, Derb Charai Zaouia El Abbassia, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Dar Yacout,Chez Abdelhay,
near_att: Salah Excursions,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,
Description: In the enchanting scenery of the Medina of Marrakech, just minutes away from the major attractions of the city, the Riad Sun of Kech came into the world. After many years of experience in international trade of Moroccan handicrafts, Noureddine, the owner, decided to invest his abilities in the construction of the Riad Sun of Kech. In the respect of the authentic traditional values, three years later Noureddine created a peaceful oasis to retreat to after being carried away by the combination of colors, flavors, sounds and scents that the "Red City" is able to offer. The patio has an indoor pool completely covered in handmade blue mosaic, and peaceful seating areas where you can taste the typical mint tea. The lounge offers a reading and relaxation corner equipped with satellite TV and Internet Wi-Fi-also available in all the rooms. The Riad is air-conditioned in the summer and heated in the winter thanks to its majestic fireplaces. The Riad has five rooms named after the most important Bab (doors) of Marrakech, decorated with hand-glazed tiles and antique woods on the doors and on the ceiling. Everything is designed with the utmost attention to detail. In the three level terrace you can enjoy a continental breakfast in the mornings whilst in the evenings sit back and witness the beautiful sunset in the company of the birds singing as natural background music. This will immerse you in a confortable and relaxing world at any moment of the day. The Italian and Moroccan staff speaks English, French, Italian, Spanish and Arabic and will be pleased to answer any queries 24/7. The experience of Hicham, who is a true marrakchi soul, will enable you to live the "Red City" as if it were your hometown, by guiding you in the right direction to unravel the hidden corners and savor the true Moroccan cuisine.
languages: English, French, Spanish, Arabic and 1 more

After many years of experience in international trade of Moroccan handicrafts, Noureddine, the owner, decided to invest his abilities in the construction of the Riad Sun of Kech. In the respect of the authentic traditional values, three years later Noureddine created a peaceful oasis to retreat to after being carried away by the combination of colors, flavors, sounds and scents that the "Red City" is able to offer. The patio has an indoor pool completely covered in handmade blue mosaic, and peaceful seating areas where you can taste the typical mint tea. The lounge offers a reading and relaxation corner equipped with satellite TV and Internet Wi-Fi-also available in all the rooms. The Riad is air-conditioned in the summer and heated in the winter thanks to its majestic fireplaces. The Riad has five rooms named after the most important Bab (doors) of Marrakech, decorated with hand-glazed tiles and antique woods on the doors and on the ceiling. Everything is designed with the utmost attention to detail. In the three level terrace you can enjoy a continental breakfast in the mornings whilst in the evenings sit back and witness the beautiful sunset in the company of the birds singing as natural background music. This will immerse you in a confortable and relaxing world at any moment of the day. The Italian and Moroccan staff speaks English, French, Italian, Spanish and Arabic and will be pleased to answer any queries 24/7. The experience of Hicham, who is a true marrakchi soul, will enable you to live the "Red City" as if it were your hometown, by guiding you in the right direction to unravel the hidden corners and savor the true Moroccan cuisine. ; -Business-Family- ; Paid public parking nearby,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Pool,Free breakfast,Airport transportation,Massage,Rooftop terrace,24-hour security,Street parking,Wifi,Pool / beach towels,Indoor pool,Coffee shop,Restaurant,Breakfast available,Breakfast in the room,Shuttle bus service,Car hire,Baggage storage,Concierge,Shared lounge / TV area,Sun loungers / beach chairs,Sun terrace,Sun umbrellas,24-hour check-in,24-hour front desk,Air conditioning,Desk,Fireplace,Housekeeping,Room service,Extra long beds,Bath / shower,Complimentary toiletries,Safe,Seating area,Sofa,Bottled water,Clothes rack,Private bathrooms,Wake-up service / alarm clock,Hair dryer,,Suites,Family rooms,Non-smoking rooms ; English, French, Spanish, Arabic and 1 more ; Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Dar Yacout,Chez Abdelhay, ; Salah Excursions,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,

title: HOSTEL DAR BEN YOUSSEF
address: DB El Haj Khadir NO 01 Barouddiyenne, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,L'Mida Marrakech,Terrasse de la fontaine,Dar Cherifa,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,Escape The Medina,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Boucharouite Museum,
Description: Well set in the centre of Marrakech, Hostel Dar Ben Youssef provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 700 m from Boucharouite Museum, less than 1 km from Souk of the Medina and a 13-minute walk from Djemaa El Fna. The property is close to popular attractions like Koutoubia Mosque, Bahia Palace and Majorelle Gardens. At the hostel, the rooms have a patio with a city view. At Hostel Dar Ben Youssef, every room is equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hostel Dar Ben Youssef include The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Le Jardin Secret and Mouassine Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 5 km from the hostel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

title: RIAD AYNI
address: 7 Derb Chaoui Zaouiya Al Abbassiya, Marrakech 40030 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Palais Soleiman,Chez Abdelhay,Table d'hotes Riad Al Jazira,
near_att: Original Marrakech,
Description: Situated in a still authentic quarter of the medina (old city center), close to the Majorelle gardens, our Riad has been imagined with the comfort of a second home, architecturally designed and realised by the best artisans. Hence, the purest and most harmonious lines highlight the traditional Moroccan materials: bejmat (stone tiled floors), tadelakt (waterproof plaster finish) and Zelig (hand cut tiles). The bedrooms are all light and air-conditioned. Equipped with flat screen TVs, safe, wifi, en-suite bathrooms with heated towel rail and hair-dryer. Overlooking the roofs of the medina, the terrace has been conceived as a place for relaxing and unwinding with its own dipping pool to cool down, Saharan canvas tent, solarium and traditional hammam. As for the sitting rooms, they are havens of coolness and freshness.

title: RIAD LES YEUX BLEUS
address: 7 Derb El Ferrane, Bab Doukkala Medina, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Chez Yassine,Riad Kniza Restaurant,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Henna Louaya,
Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Les Yeux Bleus their guest house of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, extra long beds, and a seating area, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the guest house.Riad Les Yeux Bleus features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Riad Les Yeux Bleus, there is paid public parking available nearby.Nearby landmarks such as Marrakech Train Station (0.4 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi) make Riad Les Yeux Bleus Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, and Limoni, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.If you are interested in exploring Marrakech, check out a natural history museum, such as Morocco Hiking.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Les Yeux Bleus as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

Description: Finding an ideal romantic guest house in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad Julia, a nice option for travelers like you.While staying at Riad Julia, visitors can check out Rahba Kedima Square (0.4 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Rooms at Riad Julia provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Riad Julia Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace. You can also enjoy a pool and free breakfast. Need a place to park? There is paid public parking available nearby.If you like wine bars, Riad Julia Hotel is conveniently located near 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, and Pointbar.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jardin Majorelle (0.9 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.5 mi), or Bahia Palace (0.9 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.Riad Julia looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

title: RIAD DJEBEL

near_res: Café Restaurant Dar L'hssir,Le Trou au Mur,Roti D'Or,Dar tazi,

Description: The Djebel riad DJEBEL is a long-standing house that has been renovated using traditional techniques and materials. The minimalist decor combines Moroccan handicraft with contemporary art pieces and creates a peaceful atmosphere. Structured around the central patio, the bed and breakfast has 5 rooms, an open lounge and a closed lounge with fireplace, a patio planted with trees, a massage parlour, a hammam and a large terrace with view on the medina and the Atlas Mountains.

title: RIAD KHEIRREDINE
address: 2 Derb Chelligui Sidi Ben Slimane, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,La Ferme Medina Restaurant,
near_att: Salah Excursions,Ma Creation,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,KE'CH Collecive,
Description: The heart of Marrakech As when reading a book, Marrakech is ready to be leafed through. It will welcome and pamper you with that unique sense of warmth that only Morocco can offer. You will feel exhilarated by the smell of its perfumes and its light, it will be an encounter that your traveller's soul should not miss. The Riad Kheirredine has 14 unique rooms and draws its energy and originality from its capacity to function as a bridge, a connection, between the past and the present. Thanks to the refined use of silk and the art of the "thadelakt"and the "zellij", you will be able to discover the true soul of this country. The Riad can be defined like a boutique hotel as we have a personalized service. All our Rooms are equipped with: Telephone, Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Heating, Soundproofing, Hairdryer, Bathrobe, Free toiletries, Toilet, Bathroom, Bathtub(depend on room categories) or Shower, Wake-up service, Towels/Sheets, Towels and linen. In our Rates include: A full Moroccan breakfast with a touch of Italian style. Water, fresh juices, fruit, tea, coffee, cappuccino and Moroccan pastries included in the room rates. Mobile phone to communicate with our Riad 24 hours, Wi-Fi, multilingual reception 24/24 and a night watchman. Our Fusion restaurant propose an international and Moroccan cuisine.

title: APPARTHOTEL ATRANI
address: Avenue Hassan II, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Zushi,Azyr,News Cafe,Delice Ferkouss,
near_att: Theatre Royal,6.4 Gallery,
Description: Located in Marrakesh in the Marrakech-Safi region, with Menara Gardens nearby, AppartHotel Atrani provides accommodations with free WiFi and free private parking.Accommodations are fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. A fridge and electric tea pot are also featured.Guests at the condo hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.AppartHotel Atrani has a terrace.Majorelle Gardens is 1.2 miles from the accommodation, while Yves Saint Laurent Museum is 1.4 miles away. title: RIAD LE CLOS DES ARTS
address: Riad Zitoune Jdid, Derb Tbib 50 Near Dar Si Said and Bahia Palace, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Marrakech Guide Azim,Marrakech Henna Art Cafe,Tissir Jewellery,
Description: In a narrow street of the Medina of Marrakech come and discover Riad le Clos des Arts: a charming Arab house renovated in pure Moresque style. Be seduced by this fascinating oriental atmosphere. Be tempted by the authenticity of traditional Moroccan flavours. Be refreshed by a plunge into our small pool on the terrace. The riad offers 1 suite deluxe, 2 suites, 3 double deluxe, 2 double superior and 1 single room, all with ensuite bathrooms facilities, independent heating/cooling system and safe. Food is central to the life of the house and our chef proposes daily typical Moroccan specialities and revisited traditional recipes. Dinner is on order.

title: RIAD DAR MCHICHA
address: 13 Derb El Ferrane, Riad Laarousse, Marrakech 40200 Morocco
near_res: Terrasse de la fontaine,Le Trou au Mur,Dar Zellij,Kafe Merstan,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Le Jardin Secret,
Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Dar Mchicha their small hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Dar Mchicha is located a short distance from Rahba Kedima Square (0.4 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.8 mi).Guest rooms offer air conditioning and a whirlpool bathtub, and Riad Dar Mchicha makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and express check-in and check-out. In addition, guests can enjoy free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, L'Annexe, or Cafe Mama Afrika. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Italian restaurant such as Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, or Limoni.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Jardin Majorelle (0.9 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.6 mi), and Bahia Palace (1.0 mi), which are some popular Marrakech attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the small hotel.At Riad Dar Mchicha, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

title: RIAD SIDI AYOUB
address: 113/114 Derb Al Arsa Sidi Ayoub Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Café Restaurant Dar L'hssir,Roti D'Or,Color Safra-SOUS RESERVATION,Dar Najat's Kitchen,
near_att: One Life Trips - Marrakech,Boucharouite Museum,Marrakech Tour Guide Ali,Puro Beauty Nature,
Description: Finding an ideal romantic inn in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad Sidi Ayoub, a nice option for travelers like you.As your “home away from home,” the inn rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a rooftop terrace and room service while staying at Riad Sidi Ayoub. In addition, Riad Sidi Ayoub Hotel offers a pool and free breakfast, which will help make your Marrakech trip additionally gratifying.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.5 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.8 mi) make Riad Sidi Ayoub Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular tapas restaurants such as Le Salama, Dar Moha, and Dar Zellij, all a short distance from Riad Sidi Ayoub.If you’re looking for something to do, Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.6 mi), Bahia Palace (0.6 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.6 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Riad Sidi Ayoub.Riad Sidi Ayoub puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD WINK
address: 8 Derb Tahtah Znikat Rahba, Marrakech 40030 Morocco
Description: Featuring a bar, garden and views of city, Riad Wink is located in Marrakesh, a 5-minute walk from Boucharouite Museum. Popular points of interest nearby include Bahia Palace, Djemaa El Fna and Souk of the Medina. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.At the guesthouse, all rooms include a patio with a mountain view. Each room comes with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, while certain rooms include a kitchen equipped with a microwave. At Riad Wink each room is equipped with a seating area.Continental and halal breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation.Riad Wink has a terrace.Popular points of interest near the guesthouse include The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Le Jardin Secret and Mouassine Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 5 miles from Riad Wink.

address: 44, Derb ZEARI place Jamaa El Fna, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Showcasing a spa center and sauna, Riad Des Nations is located in the Medina neighborhood in Marrakesh. The guesthouse has a barbecue and hammam, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. A flat-screen TV is provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The guesthouse also provides bike rental and car rental. Museum Dar Si Said is a few steps from Riad Des Nations, and Palais de La Bahia is 100 m from the property. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 5 km from the property. Medina is a great choice for travelers interested in markets, shopping and street markets. This is our guests' favorite part of Marrakesh, according to independent reviews. We speak your language!

title: PESTANA CR7 MARRAKECH
address: Av. de la Menara, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le 6,LA CASA Restaurant Lounge,Buddha-Bar Marrakech,Malak Emeraude,
near_att: Cyber Parc Arsat Moulay Abdeslam,Menara Mall,Jardin Des Arts,The Rose Bar,
Description: he Pestana CR7 Marrakesh is a new and sophisticated hotel located on M Avenue, in Marrakesh, Morocco. Come and explore the exotic atmosphere of one of Africa’s largest cities, so close to the desert. The hotel is located a short distance from the historic city centre, offering an exceptional level of comfort and an atmosphere inspired by the Moroccan riads, which are the traditional local houses, with rooms and areas that are spacious, bright and romantic. The 174 rooms and suites are very spacious and equipped with everything you need for an unforgettable stay – including unique decor, natural light and a 49-inch HD TV. In our restaurants, you can opt for an informal meal of tapas and drinks at the ground-floor bar or the Mediterranean dishes served on the Rooftop. It is also on the Rooftop that you will find the outdoor swimming pool and bar, both with incredible panoramic views of the Atlas mountains. To relax after a hectic day shopping at the souk or taking a camel tour, we suggest you spend an hour at our Spa, with its beauty and wellness treatments. You can also watch major sports events at our Sports Lounge & Bar.

title: RIAD ALICE TERRACE SPA

near_res: Mazel مزال Cafe,Le Medina Privilege Riad & Spa Restaurant,Dar Anika Kitchen,Le Tanjia,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,El Badi Palace,Mellah,Place des Ferblantiers,
Description: Located in Marrakech, Riad Alice is 500 m from Bahia Palace and provides various facilities, such as a restaurant, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests. All units at the riad are equipped with a seating area. At Riad Alice, each room includes air conditioning and a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Spa and wellness facilities including a hammam and a sauna are at guests' disposal during their stay at Riad Alice. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the riad. Popular points of interest near Riad Alice include Djemaa El Fna, Koutoubia Mosque and Souk of the Medina. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. This is our guests' favourite part of Marrakech, according to independent reviews. We speak your language! Riad Alice Terrace & Spa has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 2 Feb 2021.

title: RIAD SIERRA
address: 41 Derb Lalla Bent El Amri Quartier Assouel, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le Trou au Mur,Kafe Merstan,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Kui-Zin Médina,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Le Jardin Secret,Maison de la Photographie,
Description: Located in the heart of medina of Marrakech, our updated yet traditional 18th century Moroccan guesthouse features an open courtyard with a plunge pool. It also offers a lounge area with a fireplace and a cozy library. All 4 of our rooms are air-conditioned and are simply decorated in a Berber style. Each room has a seating area and a private bathroom with local, sulfate-free, and cruelty-free bathroom products by THE MOROCCANS. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Breakfast, featuring homemade local specialties, locally roasted coffee by Bloom, and freshly squeezed juices, can be enjoyed daily and is included in all room rates. Traditional Moroccan dinners can be organized by our chefs with reservation. We are also happy to help arrange massages, cooking classes, guided tours, etc. With Ben Youssef Mosque only 0.5 km away, the Jemaa El Fna square about 1.5 km away, and wonderful shopping and restaurants at every turn, this is the ideal location to experience the Red City from. We strive to support our community, and a portion of all stays is donated to Jarjeer Mule and Donkey Refuge.

Description: The original labyrinth style architecture with Moorish lines symbolizing the epitome of traditional Moroccan art, combines perfectly with the modern comfort you expect from a fine hotel. With easy access by car, you're very close to the golf courses and on foot you can visit the Majorelle gardens, souks, Marrakech museum and the Mederasa Ben Youssef before ending a perfect day at the on-going spectacle at the famous Jemaa El Fna square. The 10 bedrooms & Suites are very large and one even have private fireplace. They all have air-conditioning, direct access to the patios and terrace.

Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Riad Barroko, a romantic hotel that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a rooftop terrace while staying at Riad Barroko Hotel. In addition, Riad Barroko Hotel offers a pool and free breakfast, which will help make your Marrakech trip additionally gratifying.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Barroko Hotel is located a short distance from Marrakech Train Station (0.3 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi).When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, and Limoni, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jardin Majorelle (0.8 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.6 mi), and Bahia Palace (1.0 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Barroko as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Marrakech, Riad Dar Alsaad is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Riad Dar Alsaad makes it easy to enjoy the best of Marrakech.Riad Dar Alsaad is a romantic inn offering air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.For guests with a vehicle, there is paid public parking available nearby.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.5 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi), guests of Riad Dar Alsaad can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the wine bars, including 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, and Pointbar, all of which are a short distance from Riad Dar Alsaad.Best of all, Riad Dar Alsaad makes it easy to experience some great Marrakech attractions like Morocco Hiking, which is a popular natural history museum.Riad Dar Alsaad is sure to make your visit to Marrakech one worth remembering.

The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and slippers, all rooms at the riad have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a seating area.Guests at Riad Glamour can enjoy a à la carte or a halal breakfast.Le Jardin Secret is 1.6 miles from the accommodation, while The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech is 1.8 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 3.4 miles from Riad Glamour.  ; - ; Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Internet,Airport transportation, ; French ; Bazaar Café,Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe, ; Palácio da Bahia,Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,

Description: Finding an ideal romantic guest house in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad Adrar, a nice option for travelers like you.While staying at Riad Adrar, visitors can check out Saadian Tombs (0.3 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (1.1 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Riad Adrar features a 24 hour front desk, outdoor furniture, and a sun terrace. In addition, as a valued Riad Adrar guest, you can enjoy an on-site restaurant that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to paid public parking available nearby.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Buddha-Bar Marrakech, Kosy Bar, and Katsura, which are some sushi restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular art museums such as Photography Museum of Marrakech, The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, and Dar Si Said Museum.Riad Adrar looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Riad Mounir, a romantic bed and breakfast that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.The rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Riad Mounir features a 24 hour front desk and a concierge. In addition, as a valued Riad Mounir guest, you can enjoy free breakfast that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to paid public parking available nearby.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.8 mi), guests of Riad Mounir can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.Travelers looking to enjoy some tapas can head to Le Salama, Dar Moha, or Dar Zellij. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Italian restaurant such as Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, or Limoni.Best of all, Riad Mounir makes it easy to experience some great Marrakech attractions like Koubba of Fatima Zohra, which is a popular .We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Mounir as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

Description: See why so many travelers make Hotel Relax Marrakech their hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Rooms at Hotel Relax Marrakech offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A 24 hour front desk, currency exchange, and express check-in and check-out are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and a lounge will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Hotel Relax Marrakech, free parking is available.Nearby landmarks such as Marrakech Train Station (2.5 mi) and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret (2.5 mi) make Hotel Relax Marrakech a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Cafe Arabe, Limoni, and Bazaar Café, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular history museums, such as The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences, and Heritage Museum.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Relax Marrakech as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

title: RIAD LA PERLE ROUGE
address: 80 Derb El Mnabha Quartier Kasbah, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Zeitoun Cafe Kasbah,La Table de La Kasbah,Le Medina Privilege Riad & Spa Restaurant,Le Makassar,
near_att: Bab Agnaou,Saadian Tombs,Complexe d'Artisanat,Kasbah Mosque,
Description: Riad La Perle Rouge invites you to rest as a couple, with family, friends or colleagues for a seminar in the heart of the red city. Enjoy the softness, authenticity and change of scenery of this wonderful city of Marrakech as well as the calm and comfort of our guest house. The Riad La Perle Rouge is located in the Kasbah district next to the Royal Palace, it is the favorite district of travelers visiting Marrakech, all the main sites of interest are close as the famous Jemaa el-Fna square and its Souks 10 minutes on foot as well as the Saadian tombs, the great Koutoubia mosque, the Bahia palace and El Badi… The Riad was completely restored in 2018 with Moroccan craftsmen and typical materials (tadelakt, bejmat, zelliges, plaster sculpture). We have made an exceptional place of relaxation with lounges in the 2 patios, a large swimming pool of 7m x 3m, 4 large terraces on the roof with deckchairs and pergolas. A living room with an atypical fireplace for your moments of reading or relaxation as well as a 65 inch TV, a dining room for breakfasts and dinners, ... Easy to access, the taxi will bring you 30m from the Riad. The 9 rooms of the Riad, including a large Suite with private terrace, have a view on the patio, all with private bathroom and shower, free toiletries, hairdryer, towels, Smart Satellite TV, LG reversible air conditioning, safe, ... The decoration of the rooms and thought to invite you to travel and change of scenery. Everything has been designed for your well-being and your comfort. Our 9 rooms can accommodate 2, 3 or 4 people for a total capacity of 24 guests. A high speed WIFI connection by optical fiber is available throughout the Riad. A varied and nutritious Moroccan breakfast is served every morning. The on-site restaurant offers authentic Moroccan home-made cuisine freshly prepared by our Chef using organic ingredients from the local market. We offer a wide variety of dishes and can meet all dietary preferences. The staff will be happy to provide you with information and satisfy your requests throughout your stay. Various services will be offered to you such as: - Visit of the medina with a private tourist guide - Car, motorcycle or bicycle rental - Private or group tourist excursions - Hammam, SPA, massages - Cooking lessons - Quad or Dromedary excursion in the desert - Hot air balloon flight - Airport transfer
languages: English, French, Spanish, Arabic and 1 more

Description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Mellah district of Marrakesh, Riad Alia is a 4-minute walk from Bahia Palace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. An outdoor swimming pool, an on-site snack bar and shared lounge are available.At the guesthouse, each room includes a closet, bed linen and a patio with a pool view. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom, a shower and bathrobes, and certain units at Riad Alia have a safety deposit box.The accommodation offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast.Riad Alia has a terrace.Boucharouite Museum is 1.1 miles from the guesthouse, while The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech is 1.4 miles away. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 4.4 miles from Riad Alia, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

title: RIAD DAR ETERNITY
address: Hay Riad Laarouss Derb Lfaraka 289, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Le Jardin Secret,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Henna Louaya,
Description: Beautifully and completely restored by the renowned architect Christophe Siméon, this riad from the early 19th century opened its doors in October 2019. Ideally located in the heart of the Medina of Marrakech, Riad Dar Eternity is at the centre of a triangle consisting of Jemaa el Fna Square, the Majorelle Garden and Medersa Ben Youssef, and 10-15 minutes walk from each of them. The district is adjacent to the souks and the palaces are nearby. Discover five charming guest rooms carefully decorated with refinement in the purest Moroccan tradition, around a pleasant patio offering a pool to refresh yourself and several lounges. As well as a roof terrace with solarium, its superb and intimate On terrace and its lounges corners. For a serene stay, you have an airport shuttle service day and night, a restaurant offering the most delicious traditional cuisine and a dedicated team available 24 hours a day to organize your outings and excursions in Marrakech and Morocco. Welcome to the DAR ÉTERNITY!

title: HOTEL LE GRAND IMILCHIL
address: Avenue Echouhada, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Gm Cafe Gourmet,Comptoir Darna Marrakech,Restaurant Red House,Zeitoun Guéliz,
near_att: Paroisse des Saints Martyrs,Cantobar,VIP ROOM Marrakech,L'Ivre d'Images,
Description: Hotel Le Grand Imilchil is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Rooms at Hotel Le Grand Imilchil provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Hotel Le Grand Imilchil guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. You can also enjoy a pool and free breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Hotel Le Grand Imilchil.Nearby landmarks such as Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi) and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret (0.5 mi) make Hotel Le Grand Imilchil a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, L'Annexe, or Cafe Mama Afrika. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, or Restaurant of La Maison Arabe.If you’re looking for something to do, Jardin Majorelle (1.0 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.8 mi), and Bahia Palace (1.2 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Hotel Le Grand Imilchil.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RIAD LA VIE
address: Riad Zitoune Lakdim, Derb Jdid #77, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: L'Ô A LA BOUCHE - Marrakech,Exotic Bali,Zeitoun Guéliz,Katsura,
near_att: Marrakech Train Station,Paroisse des Saints Martyrs,Raspoutine,Souk Zrabia,
Description: Riad La Vie is located in the upscale Riad Zitoune Lakdim neighborhood of the Marrakech Medina, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is around the corner from the Bahia Palace, the Badi Palace, and the old Jewish quarter of Bab Mellah. The famous Jemaa el-Fna Square and the Koutoubia Mosque are only a 5 min walk away. This historical riad is a traditional Moroccan house wrapped around a central courtyard. It was restored by a team of skilled artisans who worked diligently to preserve the three century history of this building, while installing all modern conveniences. From the hand-carved plaster ceilings to the intricate layout of Zellige tiles, there is a gem hidden in every corner. Whether you want to live the Adventurous Life, the Beautiful Life, or the Chill Life, our hospitality team will ensure you live your BEST LIFE during your vacation with us. The property offers 8 rooms, 2 suites included, a dipping pool, and a rooftop terrace with spectacular views of the Atlas Mountains and the Koutoubia Mosque. It also houses a spa, a traditional Moroccan Hammam, and a hot tub for the cooler winter months. While the seventeenth century property retains its historical architecture and traditional design, we have added modern touches for your convenience. From our Italian style showers to our Layla beds, which allow you to choose a soft or firm mattress, your comfort is our priority.

Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Hotel Ali, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Ali Hotel offers guests free wifi.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and baggage storage. Plus, Hotel Ali offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.5 mi), guests of Ali Hotel can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular tapas restaurants such as Le Salama, Dar Moha, and Dar Zellij, all a short distance from Hotel Ali.Marrakech is also known for some great art museums, including Photography Museum of Marrakech, The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, and Dar Si Said Museum, which are not too far from Hotel Ali.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Ali as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: RIAD PRADA
address: 105 Bis Derb Jdid Medina, Marrakech 40040 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,L'Mida Marrakech,
near_att: Escape The Medina,Boucharouite Museum,Marrakech Tour Guide Ali,Tissir Jewellery,
Description: Located in Marrakech’s Medina, this air-conditioned riad is a 5 minutes’ walk from the souks and Jamaâ El Fna Square. It proposes car hire, massage services, and 3 furnished terraces.The rooms and suites are decorated in a Moroccan style, with details of artisan craftsmanship, tadelakt walls and warm colors. Each has  a private bathroom with free toiletries and some have a view of the patio.A continental breakfast is provided. Later you can relax on a sun bed, enjoy the small pool, or visit the hammam, which is a 2 minutes' walk away. Morroccan meals can be prepared upon request for lunch or dinner.Riad Prada Or is a 10-minute walk from El Bahia Palace and the Koutoubia Mosque. Marrakech Train Station is 1.9 mi away and Marrakech Menara Airport is 2.5 mi away. Activities and excursions can be organized at reception.

title: DAR TITRIT
address: 7 Derb Assabane Riad Laarouss Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Terrasse de la fontaine,Dar Cherifa,Le Trou au Mur,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Le Jardin Secret,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Musée de la Musique,
Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Marrakech, Dar Titrit is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Dar Titrit makes it easy to enjoy the best of Marrakech.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Dar Titrit makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the guest house, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.4 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.7 mi) make Dar Titrit a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.Travelers looking to enjoy some burritos can head to Roti D'or. Otherwise, you may want to check out a seafood restaurant such as Chez Mado, Da Rossana, or Snack Grand Atlas.Should time allow, Jardin Majorelle, Jemaa el-Fnaa, and Bahia Palace are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Dar Titrit is sure to make your visit to Marrakech one worth remembering.

Description: Set in Marrakech, a few steps from Jamaa Alfna Square, Riad Art & Emotions Boutique Hotel & Spa offers air-conditioned accommodation and a terrace. You can also enjoy a restaurant, a 24-hour reception, room service and free Wi-Fi. The riad has an indoor swimming pool and a tour desk. All rooms have a private bathroom with shower, bathrobes and slippers. The riad serves a continental or halal breakfast. Popular points of interest near Riad Art & Emotions Boutique Hotel & Spa include Koutoubia Mosque, Bahia Palace and Boucharouite Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 7 km from the property. Airport shuttle service is available at an additional cost. This is the favorite area of ​​travelers visiting Marrakech, according to independent reviews. Couples particularly appreciate the location of this property.

Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular lobster restaurants such as La Mamounia, Chez Mado, and Al Bahriya Seafood Restaurant, all a short distance from Riad Les Jardins des Lilas.Marrakech is also home to Morocco Hiking, a popular natural history museum that is not too far from Riad Les Jardins des Lilas.Riad Les Jardins des Lilas puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable. ; -Charming-Centrally Located- ; Paid public parking nearby,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Pool,Free breakfast,Golf course,Airport transportation,Spa,Rooftop terrace,Wifi,Restaurant,Car hire,Body wrap,Couples massage,Facial treatments,Full body massage,Hammam,Manicure,Massage,Pedicure,Solarium,24-hour security,Baggage storage,Outdoor furniture,Sun loungers / beach chairs,Sun terrace,24-hour front desk,Express check-in / check-out,Laundry service,Air conditioning,Housekeeping,Private bathrooms,Bath / shower,Complimentary toiletries,Hair dryer,,Non-smoking rooms ; English, French, Spanish, Arabic ; Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,Café - Restaurant Bab Ftouh, ; Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,Musee du Parfum,Ma Creation,

title: ROYAL MANSOUR MARRAKECH
address: Rue Abou Abbas El Sebti, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Comptoir Darna Marrakech,Restaurant Red House,L'Orangerie & Lawrence Bar - Sofitel Marrakech,La Table, Royal Mansour Marrakech,
near_att: Ensemble Artisanal,Koutoubia Mosque,Royal Mansour Bars,Le Bar Churchill,
Description: A few steps from Jemaâ El Fna Place, the Royal Mansour Marrakech is set within the walls of Marrakesh old city. The hotel was born out of a vision to create a spectacular masterpiece exceeding the demands of today’s discerning traveler, while reflecting the true essence of Moroccan tradition. There are no suites or rooms at Royal Mansour. Upon their arrival, guests are escorted through the Medina and gardens to their private residence, a traditional Moroccan Riad. This is the only hotel in the world offering that unique concept. There are a total of 53 Riads of 1 to 4 rooms, all with private courtyards, fountains, and plunge pools, dining rooms and hammams in the larger ones. Each Riad is uniquely decorated and lavishly appointed in honour of Moroccan authenticity. The Royal Mansour Marrakech covers 5 hectares and has 3 restaurants, 3 bars, gardens, a pool and a kids' club. Divided over 3 floors, the Spa of 2500 sqm offers an infinite range of exceptional treatments.

title: RIAD DAR JUSTO HOTEL BOUTIQUE SPA
address: 35 Derb Chorfa Lekbir, Marrakech 40008 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Taj Moroccan Food,L'Mida Marrakech,Ma Maison,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Dar Justo awaits you in the very heart of Marrakech's Medina. The hotel is situated in a peaceful corner of the Mouassine quarter. The riad is composed of five traditional open-air houses that are physically interconnected but spatially distinct. Upon entering you will be greeted by a small, serene reflecting pool. Continue on to discover the spacious lounges and secluded alcoves designed for inspiration, revitalization, conversation, and the occasional indulgent siesta. With 2800 m2 sprawled over three floors, five rooftop patios, and a total of 23 unique and beautifully-decorated rooms, Dar Justo invites intimate chats and relaxation amongst a backdrop of authentic Moroccan architecture. At our riad, every single detail has been accurately conceived and constructed with artisan craftsmanship and traditional materials such as Bejmat, tadelak, hand-sculpted cedar wood, and Zellij tiles. In addition to this decadent feast for the senses, the relaxed and comfortable ambiance of Dar Justo beckons you to feel at home and leave profoundly rejuvenated and restored.

title: SELMAN MARRAKECH
address: Km 5 Route d'Amizmiz, Marrakech 40160 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: At the foot of the Atlas Mountains, Selman Marrakech, a palace of distinct, designed by Jacques Garcia Selman Marrakech seduces with its timeless harmony. The property offers 55 rooms and suites and 5 private riads with a private swimming pool and butler service, meticulously executed. Selman Marrakech also feature the longest heatable swimming pool of 80m long, 3 restaurants, "Le Selman," a luxury fine dining with an international menu, "Le Pavillon," specializing in Mediterranean-inspired dishes with views of the hotel's Arabian horses and "Assyl", an authentic Moroccan restaurant. Precious moments are embodied in the presence of the beautiful thoroughbred Arabian horses. There are views of the horses from the terraces and the gardens where one can admire the equine ballet. Selman Marrakech's spa, Espace Vitalité Chenot is a tribute to oriental wellbeing. The Spa offers treatments using the specific and unique Chenot Method. Moments of pure grace add to the perfection of this timeless experience.

title: GRAND MOGADOR MENARA
address: Avenue Mohammed VI, Marrakech 40020 Morocco
near_res: Le 6,Restaurant Dar Rhizlane,Eat Me Kech,Juliette & chocolat marrakech,
near_att: Jardin Jnane El Harti,Kech Bowling Bar,Delegation Regional du Tourisme,
Description: With free Wi-Fi in public areas, this luxurious hotel features a spa, heated swimming pool and a wellness centre. Guests can choose from 3 restaurants serving Moroccan, French and international cuisine. All the rooms at Ryad Mogador Menara have a balcony and are air-conditioned. Admire views over the Congress Palace on the prestigious Avenue Mohammed VI or overlook the swimming pool. During the day, the snack restaurant, Planetfood, serves quick bites. For a relaxing afternoon, guests can enjoy a selection of teas and Moroccan pastries in the lounge cafe or on the terrace. Mogador Menara offers a range of services including boutique shops, babysitting services and free on-site parking. Marrakech Menara Airport is just a 4km drive away.

title: PALAIS NAMASKAR
address: Route de Bab Atlas, No 88/69 Province Syba, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Manzil la Tortue,Le Namaskar Restaurant,Mango Zen Pool & Restaurant,Ksar Char-Bagh,
near_att: Musee de la Palmeraie,Musée Farid Belkahia,La Perle Aux Oiseaux,Ecurie Charly Jumper,
Description: Welcome to Palais Namaskar Nestled in Marrakech’s lovely outskirts, between the desert and the Atlas Mountains, Palais Namaskar is a tranquil oasis where luxury spans in every corner. Commanding more than five acres of lakes with amazing views, the resort is source of virtuous energy and a pure delight for couples and families. Palais Namaskar is located in a quite environment, surrounded by nature, minutes from the legendary Palmeraie and its exotic landscape and 20 minutes from the city center and the iconic Marrakech Medina. A palatial architecture inspired from Feng Shui concept reflected through a unique combination of oriental and contemporary in the 41 rooms, suites, villas and exclusive palaces, all surrounded by waterways, gardens, private pools where everything echoes elegance, luxury and comfort. Offering a fine dining experience, with seasonal menus masterfully created by our talented Executive Chef, Khalid El Goumani, at “Le Namaskar” Restaurant, guests can savor international fine cuisine with a twist of Moroccan and Asian flavours. At Sunset, the Nomad bar and its rooftop terrace offer a unique backdrop where you indulge in the beauty of the surrounding landscapes, and the magnificent Atlas Mountain. A selection of signature cocktails and premium spirits is served with a large choice of fine bites. Palais Namaskar is a wellness destination with a Spa entirely dedicated to well-being, an authentic Moroccan hammam, and spa treatments cabins conferring signature treatments and skin products by La Maison D’Asa. A private coach is available to attend our guests optimize their workouts in our state of the art fitness, guests can also book outdoor yoga and meditation classes with our yoga specialist.

The renovation, completed in 2018 by Italian people, has been made with passion and respect for local traditions. Today Dar Kandi is ready to welcome tourists from all over the world in a unique context thanks to a combination of charme and relaxation. The philosophy that inspired us, was to create an environment able to make our guests feel in a familiar and romantic environment, taking advantage of comfort and elegance.

title: RIAD BOBBY MARRAKECH
address: Arset Aouzal 41, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,BlackChich Cafe Restaurant,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Dar Si Said Museum,Musée Tiskiwin,El Badi Palace,
Description: Featuring a garden and a terrace, Riad Bobby Marrakech is located in Marrakesh, a 13-minute walk from Djemaa El Fna and 0.7 miles from Souk of the Medina. Popular points of interest nearby include The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Yves Saint Laurent Museum and Koutoubia. The accommodation provides an indoor pool, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.The rooms is fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, an electric tea pot, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. The riad has certain accommodations that have a safety deposit box, and rooms have a private bathroom and a closet. At Riad Bobby Marrakech rooms contain bed linen and towels.The accommodation offers a continental or halal breakfast.Popular points of interest near Riad Bobby Marrakech include Le Jardin Secret, Mouassine Museum and Majorelle Gardens. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 5 miles from the riad, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description: Riad Naya is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.7 mi), Riad Naya is a great destination for tourists.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Riad Naya offer air conditioning.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Riad Naya, including NOMAD (0.2 mi), Comptoir Darna Marrakech (0.8 mi), and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe (0.3 mi).If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jardin Majorelle (1.1 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.3 mi), or Bahia Palace (0.7 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RIAD SHEBA
address: 35 Derb Raouia Rmila 3 min Jamaae el Fna - Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Terrasse de la fontaine,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Henna Louaya,
Description: The Riad Sheba Marrakech team is happy to welcome you in the heart of Marrakech. This is the ideal starting point for exploring the Medina and walk through the captivating streets of the "Red City ". Only 15 minutes from Marrakech Menara Airport , the Riad Dar Sheba is very easy to reach by car. Once through the doors , you will leave the hubbub of the Medina to find a calm and peaceful atmosphere. Riad Dar Sheba put at your disposal 2 rooms and 3 suites that can comfortably accommodate up to 13 people . The central position of the Riad will let you discover the historic sites of Marrakech on foot, the famous Jamaa el Fna square (5 minutes walk), the Koutoubia Mosque or the Bahia Palace and the Saadian tombs . After your day, you can relax by the pool, enjoy the massage room or lie on our terrace with stunning views of the Atlas mountains.

This is the ideal starting point for exploring the Medina and walk through the captivating streets of the "Red City ". Only 15 minutes from Marrakech Menara Airport , the Riad Dar Sheba is very easy to reach by car. Once through the doors , you will leave the hubbub of the Medina to find a calm and peaceful atmosphere. Riad Dar Sheba put at your disposal 2 rooms and 3 suites that can comfortably accommodate up to 13 people . The central position of the Riad will let you discover the historic sites of Marrakech on foot, the famous Jamaa el Fna square (5 minutes walk), the Koutoubia Mosque or the Bahia Palace and the Saadian tombs . After your day, you can relax by the pool, enjoy the massage room or lie on our terrace with stunning views of the Atlas mountains. ; Business-Quiet- ; Paid public parking nearby,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Pool,Free breakfast,Bicycle rental,Walking tours,Airport transportation,Meeting rooms,Secured parking,Wifi,Hot tub,Indoor pool,Outdoor pool,Bar / lounge,Coffee shop,Restaurant,Breakfast available,Breakfast in the room,Kids' meals,Special diet menus,Wine / champagne,Shuttle bus service,Car hire,Massage,Solarium,Rooftop terrace,Baggage storage,Concierge,Currency exchange,Newspaper,Sun terrace,24-hour front desk,Express check-in / check-out,Private check-in / check-out,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Ironing service,Shoeshine,Air conditioning,Housekeeping,Safe,VIP room facilities,Bottled water,,Suites,Family rooms,Non-smoking rooms ; English, French, Arabic ; Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Terrasse de la fontaine, ; Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Henna Louaya,

title: RIAD SHAJARA
address: 58 Bis Derb Jdid - Douar Graoua, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,La Cantine Des Gazelles,
near_att: Boucharouite Museum,Marrakech Henna Art Cafe,Tissir Jewellery,Marrakech Tour Guide,
Description: Featuring a shared lounge and massage services, RIAD SHAJARA is located in Marrakesh, a 10-minute walk from Bahia Palace and 0.6 miles from Boucharouite Museum. The property is around a 16-minute walk from The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, 1.1 miles from Le Jardin Secret and 1.3 miles from Koutoubia. The riad has pool views, an outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available.Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, all rooms at the riad have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also offer a seating area. At RIAD SHAJARA all rooms include bed linen and towels.The accommodation has a sun terrace.Djemaa El Fna is 1.5 miles from RIAD SHAJARA, while Souk of the Medina is 1.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 4.1 miles from the riad, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description: Located about ten kilometers from the city center of Marrakech, on the road to Ouarzazate, Atlas Widan offers you the luxury of a change of scenery and tranquility, while having access in a few minutes to the medina and the bustle of its souks. A true haven of serenity extending over 4 hectares and entirely turned towards the Atlas mountains, the place magnifies the Moroccan art of living.

title: LES DEUX TOURS
address: Circuit de la Palmeraie - BP, 153 Douar Abiad, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: Located in the heart of the Marrakech palm grove yet just minutes away from the Medina, Hotel Les Deux Tours invites you to experience an Oriental dream, a time away from time to charm every visitor. Our private Garden & Pool Suites are scattered throughout a verdant 3-hectare park of labyrinthine Andalusian gardens, pools and fountains. Enjoy staying in one of our 40 rooms or suites, all combining traditional architecture and stylish décor with modern comforts. Private residences with heated private pools. Our new ‘Exceptional Suites’ offer unrivalled luxury and style. Settle into a world conceived for relaxation as well as enjoying the mystique of the Marrakech palm groves and nearby bustling city. Staying at Les Deux Tours is an opportunity to indulge in an array of gastronomic delights. For a light lunch outdoors, La Pergola welcomes you in a relaxing and calm garden environment adjacent to the swimming pool. Dinner is served at the Salammbô, where elegant cuisine in perfect harmony with the refined ambiance of the venue is served both inside or out on the sumptuous terrace. Evening drinks are served at the Bar where our skilled mixologist works wonders with fresh fruits and refined spirits.

title: RIAD AL RIMAL
address: 43 Derb Fahl Ezzafriti Quartier Laksour, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Taj Moroccan Food,Jemaa ElFna Restaurant,Terrasse de la fontaine,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Riad al Rimal translates to “the house of the sands”. Nestled in the narrow and iconic streets of the medina, we are a desert hideaway located in a quiet corner among the busy streets of Marrakech. We are located in the old district of Ksour, a few steps from the famous souks of the city and close to the Al Koutoubia mosque. Our design is based on a subtle blend of oriental style and touches of modernity. You will notice our attention to the rich and authentic heritage of Marrakech through our 18 rooms (including 2 suites) designed with art. We invite you to come and enjoy our steam room and spa, float in our beautiful heated pool or soothe your tired muscles in our bubbling jacuzzi. Sip a cool drink on our rooftop terrace while taking in the sights and sounds of the streets below. Relive after a day at the market with Moroccan specialties expertly created by our cook. We aim to showcase the best of Morocco through the Riad and immerse our guests in its hospitality and local atmosphere.

Description: Riad Alaka is ideally located in the heart of the medina. It lies right at the entrance of the souks and at a few minutes’ walk from the exhilarating Place Jemna El Fna.This is a splendid property, a real haven of peace, decorated in the traditional Moroccan style. Guests will be struck by its elegant and relaxing charm. The tastefully decorated interior oozes passion and respect for Moroccan tradition.

title: RIAD ROMANCE
address: Derb El Baroud 26, Hart Soura, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le Trou au Mur,Kafe Merstan,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Kui-Zin Médina,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Maison de la Photographie,Herboriste Des Amis,
Description: Riad Romance is an authentic 17th century Riad in Marrakech's bustling medina. A team of Moroccan artisans spent two years lovingly restoring it into a jewel. An oasis of tranquillity and comfort, the Riad provides a home-from-home experience. It has four rooms, each combining Moroccan chic with modern style. Guests can relax in the large, welcoming lounge area with its romantic fireplace. Or, laze on the sunbeds on the roof-top garden, where they can glimpse the fascinating medina and spectacular Atlas mountains. Riad Romantic's big swimming pool is the perfect antidote to the heat. Surrounded by beautiful green plants, the pool is in a peaceful, relaxing environment. Riad Romance is conveniently located in the heart of the Ancient Medina (walled old town) of Marrakech, less than one minute walk from the souks,spice Market and two of the main historical sights of the city: the Old Coranique school Medersa Ben youssef, Museum of Marrakech . The Museum of Photography which is one of the highlights of the city is located less than 1min walk from Ours and the Unesco world heritage and famous square Jamaa Lfna is located less than 10mins walk from.

title: HOTEL ALMAS
address: 79, Avenue Moulay Rachid, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Patisserie Gato,Le Tire Bouchon Marrakech,L'Ô A LA BOUCHE - Marrakech,
near_att: MACMA Musee d'Art et de Culture de Marrakech,Kech adventures,Créazen Spirit,Carre eden shopping center,
Description: Marrakech, the red pearl of the desert, hosts a real gem: ALMAS Hotel. Located at the heart of the animated Gueliz district, ALMAS Hotel, a real haven of comfort,is a few minutes away from the famous Jamaa-el-Fna Square. You are going to find all the hospitality and comfort of a great hotel close to Mohammed V Avenue known for its cafes,restaurants and shops. ALMAS Hotel also offers an open view over the city and the Atlas Mount from its panoramic sun terrace, an excellent space for relaxation. A swimming pool and a snack also located there. High Quality and Attentive Service Faithful to the Moroccan hospitality, ALMAS Hotel reserves warm and convivial welcome;besides the careful personnel is at your service 24/ 24hs. A breakfast service is proposed and lets you start your day with a magnificent buffet.

title: MANDARIN ORIENTAL MARRAKECH
address: Route Du Golf Royal, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: Finding an ideal luxury hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech, a nice option for travelers like you. Free wifi is offered to guests, and Villas & Suites at Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning. During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a Butler service and In Villa Dining. Guests of Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech are also welcome to enjoy an Indoor and Outdoor Swimming pool inside the Resort or in the privacy or their Villas and Suites. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available. Nearby landmarks such as Miaara Jewish Cemetery (2.0 mi) and Mellah (2.2 mi) make Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech. While visiting Marrakech, you may want to try some lobster at one of the nearby restaurants, such as La Mamounia. Looking to explore? Then look no further than Museum of African Contemporary Art Al Maaden (0.2 mi), which is a popular Marrakech attraction – and it is conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel. Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: LE RELAIS DE MARRAKECH
address: Route de Casablanca N9 Douar Belaaguid, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Pointbar,Amal,Dar Zellij,Kech Burger,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Marrakech Tours Guide,33 Rue Majorelle,Le Musée Berbère,
Description: The Domain" Le Relais de Marrakech "provides a total depaysment. Jessy and Cristina welcome you and advice you, on a large park, which looks like a little piece of heaven. The domain provides comfortable rooms from 2 to 6 persons under nomad tents, African huts or Kasbahs as well as 3 suites. In the shade of olive and palm trees," Le Relais de Marrakech" , situated at the entrance of Marrakech in the palm grove, is an original space which offers wellness and rest. Jacuzzi, swimming pool, fitness, free wifi, bar ,everything is made to relax and benefit of the nature peace , a few kilometers away from the city center. A restaurant, in the typically Moroccan decoration, next to the swimming pool with a view on a magnificent flowery garden, proposes you delicious Moroccan specialities. More, "Le Relais de Marrakech" is one of the rare places in Morocco to provide an outdoor hotel space landscaped where your friends can join you , travelers and adventurers in 4x4, in motorcycle or camping cars. It allows you, if you wish to, to meet people and share the experience of their journey in Africa and the sensations of adventure which provide the Moroccan desert and the large African South . " Le Relais "wants to be a friendly, family and typical space for persons who wish enriching holidays of discovery in a quiet, restful and pleasant place.

near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: The Rosaroum Domain was founded in 2010 by a family that's been living in Marrakech for over 35 years. This domain was created to answer a very specific demand, this being to make luxury become accessible and having a wellbeing experience in Marrakech. All this takes place in a very family atmosphere.In 2012, the Domain was complete and almost ready to greet guests: the gardens had expanded, the tree and flowers varieties had multiplied... In the end of 2013, the Domain will take off thanks to the delivery of its final master piece: the Traditional Spa."It's not just another real estate project, it's our passion and the commitment to always propose the best welcome, services, culture, that we want our guests to discover and share with us through our villas and the advantages we offer. Today, you can not only find a profusion of rental opportunities in Marrakech, but also expect the quality and reliability that have granted us a class category A"This corroborates the quality of the villas but also of the services which accompany the clients daily. We additionally insist on the fact that each villa has an individual swimming pool and a private garden in order to respect the intimacy of each couple or family staying in our Domain that wants to relax in the sun in private.Whatever the site you discover in our Domain, you'll feel at home whilst enjoying our hotel tailored quality services and our concierge service which has the best contacts and partners in Marrakech.Because your time is valuable, the whole team of the Domain is at your disposal to make your stay a success. When coming to the Rosaroum Domain, you are sure of entering a place of tranquility thanks to a quality stay trew our luxury rooms and living rooms, our services that will make this journey a unique moment.Let yourself be seduced by this haven of peace, make of having all inclusive holidays a habit, and discover an exceptional city thanks to its weather, history, and numerous activities...

title: RIAD BABA ALI
address: 74 Derb Baba Ali El Moukef Marrakech, Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Café Restaurant Dar L'hssir,Le Trou au Mur,Roti D'Or,Kafe Merstan,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,Escape The Medina,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Boucharouite Museum,
Description: Located in the Medina of Marrakech, Riad Baba Ali is a 15-minute walk from the Jamâa El Fna Square and a 20-minute walk from the Bahia Palace. It offers a patio with a plunge pool and a rooftop terrace with sunbeds.With a Moroccan-style décor, all rooms offer air conditioning and a private bathroom with a shower. Some feature views of the patio.Guests are invited to enjoy a continental breakfast every morning at Riad Baba Ali. Local specialties can also be served if you request in advance.This riad offers a communal seating area, a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Massage treatments can be arranged at an extra cost.

title: RIAD NASHIRA SPA
address: 16, Derb Sidi Makhlouf Diour Saboune, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le Trou au Mur,Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Kui-Zin Médina,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,Le Jardin Secret,Henna Louaya,Herboriste Des Amis,
Description: Riad Nashira & Spa brings a new dimension to hospitality in Marrakech, a concept that goes beyond other experiences. Riad Nashira & SPA inaugurates a new blend of style and values creating new sensations. A short walk to the major attractions of the city, among which Medersa Ben Youssef, the Marrakech Museum, the Souk and the famous Jemaa el-Fnaa Square: Riad Nashira & Spa is part of the open-air museum of the Medina, where with every glance you can enjoy intricate alleyways, monumental fountains, the city's mosques and traditions, in close contact with the rhythms and customs of its inhabitants. Riad Nashira & Spa has 16 rooms, a sun terrace, indoor and outdoor pools and a fine restaurant. In the Spa you can enjoy our traditional hammams, massages and a Jacuzzi, let yourself be pampered by the expert hands of our masseuses and our natural beauty products, all from the region of Marrakech. Our culinary offering, from early morning breakfasts to the elegant evening dinners, perhaps under a starry sky, is wide and varied and offers fresh, wholesome foods prepared onsite by our chef and his team. Riad Nashira & Spa wants to make you feel at home: its staff is at your full disposal and all of the Spa services have been organized so that you can make the most of your stay in Marrakech.

title: RIAD JONAN
address: 35 Derb Bzou Rue De La Kasbah, Marrakech 44000 Morocco
near_res: Zeitoun Cafe Kasbah,La Table de La Kasbah,Le Medina Privilege Riad & Spa Restaurant,Le Makassar,
near_att: Bab Agnaou,Saadian Tombs,Complexe d'Artisanat,Kasbah Mosque,
Description: Riad Jonan is a traditional house of Marrakesh recently renewed. It offers you all the comfort of a modern hotel in a sumptuous decor . You have the choice between 10 comfortable rooms complemented with hand made furniture from the craftsmen of the Medina. All rooms are en-suite and have heating and air-conditioning. Some have satellite television, English speaking channels and music system, a safe and a mini-bar. The breakfast is a delightful moment at Riad Jonan, and is usually served in the courtyard around the fountain or on the roof terrace. Our cook can prepare all kinds of delicious traditional Moroccan dishes (couscous, tajines, vegetable salads... ) All homemade with fresh products, or little snacks. Our staff, all English speaking, can help you in any situation and can advise you excursions and visits,and book them for you.

Description: In the middle of Marrakech's historical center with easy access by car, Dar Karma Riad is an exclusive boutique hotel with 6 rooms (3 suites and 3 singles), and welcomes up to 14 people. With large open patios, housing includes heated swimming pool, hammam, beautiful terraces, internet wifi everywhere.Bread, jams, Moroccan pastries as well as the whole gastronomic European and Moroccan cooking served at the Dar Karma Riad are home made from carefully selected organic products.

title: HOTEL LAWRENCE DARABIE
address: N 1 Angle Abou Baker Seddik Et Omar Ben Khattab Hivernage, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Azyr,Eat Me Kech,News Cafe,Delice Ferkouss,
near_att: Theatre Royal,6.4 Gallery,
Description: Located just a 20-minute walk from Jemaa El Fna Square, Hotel Lawrence d'Arabie features an outdoor swimming pool, cafe terrace and traditional Moroccan decor. The famous Majorelle Gardens are 1 mile away. All suites feature a balcony with views of the pool or street, a sitting area, a TV with satellite channels and a safe. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast can be served in the guest rooms or terrace. Guests can also sample international or Moroccan cuisine in the restaurant and enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional features include a garden, free Wi-Fi access and free private parking on site. El Bahia Palace is 1 mile away and Marrakech Menara Airport is ideally located only a 15-minute drive from the hotel.
