title: WAZO HOTEL
address: Boulevard Abd El Karim El Khattabi, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Wazo Hotel, a charming hotel that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Wazo Hotel offer air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. Guests of Wazo Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Wazo Hotel is located a short distance from La Palmeraie (2.1 mi) and Les Secrets Hammam&spa (2.9 mi).When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Limoni, Catanzaro, and VITA NOVA, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.If you’re looking for something to do, Gueliz (0.9 mi) is a nice way to spend some time, and it is within walking distance of Wazo Hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Wazo Hotel as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: RIAD ADRIANA
address: 99, derb Jdid Bab Doukkala, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Riad Kniza Restaurant,Henna cafe,
near_att: Henna Cafe Marrakech,Henna Louaya,Rue Bab Doukkala Market,Mustapha Blaoui,
Description: Welcome to Riad Adriana, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Riad Adriana aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Nearby landmarks such as Marrakech Train Station (0.3 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.7 mi) make Riad Adriana a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Riad Adriana Hotel offer air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace. Guests of Riad Adriana Hotel are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, there is paid public parking available nearby.Travelers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, L'Annexe, or Cafe Mama Afrika. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Italian restaurant such as Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, or Limoni.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Jardin Majorelle (0.7 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.7 mi), and Bahia Palace (1.2 mi), which are some popular Marrakech attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the bed and breakfast.Riad Adriana puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Featured in Elle Decoration for its gorgeous interiors, this member of SLH is a stylish retreat set in flower-filled courtyards. title: LES JARDINS DE LA KOUTOUBIA
address: 26 rue de la Koutoubia, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Taj Moroccan Food,Jemaa ElFna Restaurant,Dar Cherifa,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Les Jardins de La Koutoubia is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.6 mi), guests of Les Jardins de La Koutoubia can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well-known attractions. Guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and Les Jardins De La Koutoubia makes getting online easy as free wifi is available. You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a rooftop terrace, a Sky Bar, and Indian and Asian food, Moroccan and international food, a concierge, and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and breakfast during their visit. Marrakech has plenty of Italian restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, and Limoni, which are serving up some great dishes. There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular gardens such as Jardin Majorelle, Le Jardin Secret, and ANIMA Garden. Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

near_res: Le Blokk,Fuego Latino,Palais Soleiman,Nid'cigogne,
near_att: Marrakech Tours Guide,Gueliz,Musee de la Palmeraie,Le Vizir Center,
Description: Sol Oasis Marrakech All Inclusive Hotel, located in the heart of a palm grove. Perfect location to visit the surroundings of Marrakech and go on excursions. Spectacular views of the Atlas Mountains. Free shuttle service to city center. Sol Room 23m2 room with Moroccan style. Queen or king-size bed, cable TV, full bathroom and additional toilet, safe, towels and sofa. Sol Family Room has 41m2. fully equipped with modern touches and local crafts. (Both types of rooms can have a balcony or not). It has a main pool of 500m2, heated outdoor pool, splash park for children, sports court and stage for shows, parking and GYM. "All inclusive" regime enjoys a rich gastronomic offer local and international cuisine. An exclusive area of ​​hammocks where you can relax: Café Maure. Great cultural wealth and beautiful reddish sunsets.

Description: If you’re looking for a charming hotel in Marrakech, look no further than Hotel Islane.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.4 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.6 mi), Hotel Islane is a great destination for tourists.Islane Hotel offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a desk, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features breakfast. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to paid public parking available nearby.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular oyster restaurants such as Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, La Mamounia, and Chez Mado, all a short distance from Hotel Islane Marrakech.Marrakech is also known for some great parks, including Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam and La Palmeraie, which are not too far from Hotel Islane.The staff at Hotel Islane looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

Description: Dar Warda is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Dar Warda Hotel is located a short distance from Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.9 mi).Rooms at Dar Warda Hotel offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge are some of the conveniences offered at this boutique hotel. A pool and a lounge will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Dar Warda Hotel, parking is available.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, which are some Mediterranean restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.If you’re looking for something to do, Jardin Majorelle (1.1 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.5 mi), and Bahia Palace (0.8 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Dar Warda Hotel.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

If you are driving to Riad Hayati, free parking is available.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as El Badi Palace (0.2 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.5 mi), Riad Hayati is a great destination for tourists.While in Marrakech be sure to experience local oyster favorites at Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, La Mamounia, or Chez Mado.Best of all, Riad Hayati makes it easy to experience many great Marrakech attractions like Medina of Marrakesh, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa, which are some popular historic sites.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Hayati as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

Description: Between the great Bab Doukkala mosque and Dar El Bacha Palace, gateway to the antiques district, Riad Helen is only 10 minutes walk from the famous square Jemaa el Fna.Its 5 spacious and bright rooms are equipped with a double bed (possibility of an extra bed in one of them). In bathrooms covered with tadelakt (traditional Moroccan plaster) you will find towels, bathrobes and shower brand Les Sens de Marrakech.The Riad has a central patio with fountain where you can enjoy your breakfast or meals. Unless you prefer the dining room, convivial or terrace and a beautiful view over the rooftops of Dar El Bacha Palace.At Riad Helen there is no preset menu.

title: RIAD NORA
address: 29A Rue de la Bahia, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,BlackChich Cafe Restaurant,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Tissir Jewellery,Dar Si Said Museum,Musée Tiskiwin,
Description: Riad Nora was built in the 19th Century as part of the Bahia Palace in Marrakech. At that time, this historical house was inhabited by a Moroccan chief magistrate. The guesthouse is now under Swiss management and impresses with its authentic character and welcoming charm. Riad Nora is in the center of the old town, just a few steps from the Souks and 7 minutes walk from the main square Djemaa el Fna. Some major attractions such as the Bahia Palace and the beautiful Saadian tombs are located very nearby. The leafy double terrace offers a peaceful atmosphere and beautiful views of the Atlas mountains. The light-coloured courtyard provides a small pool for refreshing after a long day in the medina.

title: LES JARDINS DE MARRAKECH
address: Route de Sidi Rahal Ouled Hassoune, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Cafe Restaurant Chez l'Habitant,Chill Out Villa,
Description: Located in Marrakesh, 11 miles from Bahia Palace, LES JARDINS DE MARRAKECH has accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guesthouse has a garden and provides a sun terrace.The rooms at the guesthouse come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Each room comes with an electric tea pot, while certain rooms have a patio and others also feature pool views. At LES JARDINS DE MARRAKECH rooms include bed linen and towels.Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.The wellness area at LES JARDINS DE MARRAKECH is comprised of a hammam and a hot tub. You can play ping pong and tennis at the guesthouse, and car rental is available.Boucharouite Museum is 11 miles from LES JARDINS DE MARRAKECH, while The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech is 11 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 14 miles from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

You can play ping pong and tennis at the guesthouse, and car rental is available.Boucharouite Museum is 11 miles from LES JARDINS DE MARRAKECH, while The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech is 11 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 14 miles from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.  ; -Classic-Centrally Located- ; Restaurant,WiFi,Swimming pool,Spa, ;   ; Cafe Restaurant Chez l'Habitant,Chill Out Villa, ; ,,

title: IBEROSTAR CLUB PALMERAIE MARRAKECH
address: 6 Commune Rurale Ouidane Amerchich, Marrakech 03759 Morocco
near_res: Manzil la Tortue,Fuego Latino,Le 19,Le Namaskar Restaurant,
near_att: Musee de la Palmeraie,Le Domaine Du Retro,Musée Farid Belkahia,Mariinski,
Description: The Iberostar Club Palmeraie Marrakech hotel got ISO 22000 certified in its latest version 2018 (Kitchens, restaurants and bars) in January 2020 by the Moroccan institute for standardization IMANOR. The hotel was completely refurbished to offer guests a new, more comprehensive experience. Its excellent location – amid the 100,000 palm trees in Marrakesh – is an invitation to discover the exceptional surroundings of the Atlas Mountains. Its services and 4-star rating complement each other to perfection. It features modern facilities where you can enjoy a couple’s holiday or a family holiday: outdoor pools and children’s water park, SPA Sensations, delicious Moroccan cuisine served at its three restaurants, two bars, a food truck, activity programme, including ten sports courts, night-time shows, children’s playground, and golf courses nearby. The Club Palmeraie Marrakech hotel offers all of the entertainment you could possibly desire to enjoy the perfect holiday.

title: RIAD DAR NADWA
address: 51 Diour Jdad, Marrakech 40030 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Dar Yacout,Chez Abdelhay,dar yakut,
near_att: Salah Excursions,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,
Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Dar Nadwa their bed and breakfast of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Nearby landmarks such as Marrakech Train Station (0.7 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.8 mi) make Riad Dar Nadwa a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.The rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Riad Dar Nadwa features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. In addition, as a valued Riad Dar Nadwa guest, you can enjoy an on-site restaurant that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to street parking.Marrakech has plenty of French restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, Terrasse des épices, and Palais Jad Mahal, which are serving up some great dishes.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Jardin Majorelle (0.6 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.9 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.5 mi), which are some popular Marrakech attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the bed and breakfast.At Riad Dar Nadwa, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

title: COCO CANEL MARRAKECH

near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe,Taj Moroccan Food,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,One Life Trips - Marrakech,Jemaa el-Fnaa,Marrakech Guide Azim,
Description: Welcome to Riad Coco Canel, Nestled in a serene environment, our Riad offers a warm and welcoming getaway. The 12 en-suite bedrooms and the swimming pool are designed in an original Moroccan style and meet the highest standards of comfort and privacy. If you wish, we can organize our Riad so that it is reserved exclusively for you. The kitchen offers a variety of authentic dishes that make it an unforgettable dining experience. The heated swimming pool offers a relaxing atmosphere to enjoy an evening aperitif or a romantic dinner. Our dedicated and friendly team will ensure that your holiday remains a memorable exposure to Morocco. On request, we can organize your meeting at the airport (15 minutes from the airport) when arriving 15 EUR

title: CESAR RESORT SPA
address: Route de l'Ourika, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Al Fassia Aguedal,Gusto,Pains & Delices,Nommos,
near_att: Virtual Room,la boutique photo,555 Famous Club,Almazar Centre Commercial,
Description: Cesar Resort & Spa is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.While staying at Cesar Resort & Spa, visitors can check out Saadian Tombs (1.8 mi) and Bab Agnaou (2.0 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a concierge, a rooftop terrace, and room service while staying at Cesar Resort & Spa. In addition, Cesar Resort & Spa offers a pool and a rooftop bar, which will help make your Marrakech trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Italian restaurants, including Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, and Bazaar Café, all of which are a short distance from Cesar Resort & Spa.Marrakech is also known for some great historic sites, including Medina of Marrakesh, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa, which are not too far from Cesar Resort & Spa.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

Description: The riad Anya is situated in the district Sidi Mimoun in 10mn on foot of the place(square) Jmena El Fna. Of the terrace you discover the gardens of the famous hotel " Mamounia ," a hammam, a room of massage, a swimming pool of 15m2 as well as a Jacuzzi shall decorate your stay. The cook(cooker) prepares Moroccan meals (earthenware cooking pots(meat stews) and cuckoos) of which you remember you for a long time. Mohamed will help you to organize your stay if you wish it.

title: RED HOTEL MARRAKECH
address: Angle Avenue Mohammed VI Et Avenue Hassan II, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Azar,Zushi,Azyr,Casa Del Jefe,
near_att: Theatre Royal,6.4 Gallery,Signature by Majda,
Description: See why so many travelers make Red Hotel Marrakech their hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Red Hotel Marrakech offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. Guests of Red Hotel Marrakech are also welcome to enjoy a pool and free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, parking is available.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Red Hotel Marrakech is located a short distance from Marrakech Train Station (0.9 mi) and Jemaa el-Fnaa (1.6 mi).Marrakech has plenty of Mediterranean restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, which are serving up some great dishes.Should time allow, Jardin Majorelle and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Red Hotel Marrakech as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

Description: Located in the Medina of Marrakech, Riad Naya is a 10-minute walk from the Koutoubia Mosque and and 2,950 feet from Jamâa El Fna Square. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a rooftop terrace and a furnished patio.With a Moroccan-style décor, the colorful rooms feature air conditioning, a seating area and a private bathroom with a shower.Guests are invited to enjoy a Moroccan breakfast every morning at Riad Naya. Moroccan and International dishes can also be requested.This property is 7.5 mi from Marrakech-Menara Airport and an airport shuttle service can be arranged at an extra cost. Marrakech Train Station is a 15-minute drive away.

title: DAR GUELIZ
address: 17 Rue Mauritanie, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Patisserie Gato,Le Tire Bouchon Marrakech,Baromètre Marrakech,
near_att: MACMA Musee d'Art et de Culture de Marrakech,Kech adventures,Créazen Spirit,Carre eden shopping center,
Description: Located in Marrakesh, a 20-minute walk from Majorelle Gardens and 1.3 miles from Yves Saint Laurent Museum, Dar Guéliz provides city views and free WiFi.The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. Some units are air-conditioned and include a balcony and/or a terrace, as well as a seating area.Djemaa El Fna is 1.6 miles from the condo hotel, while Souk of the Medina is 1.6 miles away. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 4.1 miles from Dar Guéliz, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

title: RIAD O2
address: 97 Derb Semmaria, Sidi Ben Slimane, Marrakech 40008 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,Café - Restaurant Bab Ftouh,
near_att: Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,Musee du Parfum,Rue Bab Doukkala Market,
Description: As soon as you enter Riad O2, you will be seduced by the peacefulness of the house. A subtle blend of elegant oriental curves and sleek modern lines. Moad, Rachida and Hassan will welcome you warmly with mint tea and Moroccan pastries in the shade of the banana tree on the central patio or on the magnificent roof terrace.Elegant traditional architecture meets modern design in this peaceful oasis with 6 bedrooms, a jacuzzi-pool, hammam and a large sunny roof-terrace with Berber tents. An adjacent private 2 bedroom house also available to rent should you require additional space. A riad is a large traditional Moroccan house built around a central courtyard.

Description: BE welcomed to the historical medina, the heart of Marrakech! Full of history, traditions, culture, art and handicrafts, where the past meets the present. We bring Moroccan culture to the surface and open the doors to this fascinating world. We are here to make your stay with us a great and an unforgettable experience with our tips and recommendations, and with our long experience, and knowledge we offer nothing but the best. Let us know about your wishes and ideas, we will arrange everything you need to fully enjoy the time of your life in Marrakech!

Description: Riad Bohémia features a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Marrakesh. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.All guest rooms in the guesthouse are equipped with an electric tea pot. Riad Bohémia provides certain units that include a safety deposit box, and every room comes with a private bathroom and a closet. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 3.1 miles from the accommodation.

Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Marrakech, Riad Calista is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants, Riad Calista makes it easy to enjoy the best of Marrakech.Rooms at Riad Calista provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Riad Calista guests have access to room service. You can also enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant.While staying at Riad Calista Hotel, visitors can check out Marrakech Ramparts (0.0 mi) and Koubba Almoravid (0.0 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.If you are looking for a good wine bar, you may want to check out 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, or Pointbar while staying at Riad Calista Hotel.During your visit, be sure to check out popular history museums like The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences, and Heritage Museum, which are all a short distance from the hotel.Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Riad Calista is sure to make your visit to Marrakech one worth remembering.

Description: The heart of your desires,Welcome to Marrakesh in the sur drenched country of Morroco at just a 6 min walk from the Jamaâ El Fna square in the depths of the Medina find Anaïs's Riad, a luxury peace haven. Providing everything you need to relax: siestas on embroidered linen sheets in 5 luxury suites equipped with A/C, heating, Wifi and en-suite bathrooms. Wether you'd rather relax near the fireplace in the cosy lounge or on the rooftop sun-deck and bar, our friendly and professional staff, fluent in 4 languages, is at your service at any hour of the day or night. Our outstanding chef will dazzle your taste buds, while our manager will arrange personalised services or excursions (massages, oriental dancing classes, golf, guided tours, buggy rides, etc...)

title: THE OBEROI MARRAKECH

near_res: Manzil la Tortue,Mes'Lalla,Le 19,Le Namaskar Restaurant,

Description: The Oberoi, Marrakech is located within twenty-eight acres of Mediterranean orchards with fragrant citrus trees and centuries old olive groves. Our five star hotel in Marrakech has beautifully landscaped gardens punctuated by water features. Its authentic architecture is inspired by palaces of ancient Morocco. The courtyard of the main building incorporates the design of the historic Medersa Ben Youssef, built in the 14th century; one of Marrakech’s most famous historic monuments. The resort offers picturesque views of the majestic snow-capped Atlas Mountains. Spacious accommodation, personalized wellness offerings, restaurants serving authentic Moroccan and international cuisines and an engaging children's activity area are complemented by our warm sincere hospitality for an unforgettable experience at the best hotel in Marrakech.

title: RIAD AL MOUSSIKA
address: 17 Derb Cherkaoui Douar Graoua, Place Dar Moulay Idriss, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
Description: Riyad Al Moussika is a renovated palace with a shaded rooftop terrace overlooking Marrakech’s medina, located a 5-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square. You can relax in the long plunge pool or in the hammam.Decorated in a traditional style with carved wooden furniture, the rooms all have a view of the patio. Each of the rooms with attached bathroom includes satellite TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi access.A traditional breakfast is served every morning and it can be taken on the terrace. Moroccan specialties and Italian cuisine can be prepared for dinner upon request.With low-cost parking on site, this property is a 10-minute walk from Medersa Ibn Youssef. Tours, transfers and excursions can be arranged on site and Marrakech Airport is 4.3 mi away.
Properties: Air conditioning, WiFi, Swimming pool, Breakfast,

title: RIAD RADIA
address: 60, Derb Moulay Abdelkader Dabachi, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,L'Mida Marrakech,La Cantine Des Gazelles,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Riad Radia, a romantic guest house that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.Rooms at Riad Radia provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Riad Radia guests have access to a 24 hour front desk. Need a place to park? There is paid public parking available nearby.While staying at Riad Radia, visitors can check out Rahba Kedima Square (0.1 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.7 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.While in Marrakech be sure to experience local crab favorites at Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, Dar Cherifa, or La Trattoria Marrakech.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.3 mi), Bahia Palace (0.5 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.4 mi), which are all within walking distance of the guest house.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Radia as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: RIAD DOUJA
address: 48 rue Sidi Bouloukate, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,La Cantine Des Gazelles,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Marrakech, Riad Douja is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its quaint environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Riad Douja makes it easy to enjoy the best of Marrakech.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the guest house.Riad Douja features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage, to help make your stay more enjoyable.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Douja is located a short distance from Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.4 mi).While in Marrakech be sure to experience local tempura favorites at Limoni, Les Jardins de la Medina, or Namazake.Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a natural history museum, such as Morocco Hiking.Riad Douja is sure to make your visit to Marrakech one worth remembering.

title: RIAD MAIPA
address: 5, derb Jdid-Derb Dabbachi, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,L'Mida Marrakech,La Cantine Des Gazelles,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Welcome to Riad Maipa, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Riad Maipa aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.2 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.6 mi), Riad Maipa is a great destination for tourists.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Riad Maipa makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and newspaper. In addition, guests can enjoy a hot tub and breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is secured parking available to guests.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular shrimp restaurants such as Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, L'Annexe, and Cafe Mama Afrika, all a short distance from Riad Maipa.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular art galleries, such as Musee de la Palmeraie, 6.4 Gallery, and Galerie Dawiya.Riad Maipa puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

As an added convenience, there is secured parking available to guests.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular shrimp restaurants such as Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, L'Annexe, and Cafe Mama Afrika, all a short distance from Riad Maipa.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular art galleries, such as Musee de la Palmeraie, 6.4 Gallery, and Galerie Dawiya.Riad Maipa puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable. ; -Family-Centrally Located- ; Paid public parking nearby,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Hot tub,Free breakfast,Airport transportation,Massage,Rooftop terrace,Baggage storage,Secured parking,Wifi,Outdoor pool,Plunge pool,Bar / lounge,Coffee shop,Breakfast available,Car hire,Concierge,Newspaper,Non,smoking hotel,Shared lounge / TV area,Shops,Sun terrace,24-hour front desk,Dry cleaning,Air conditioning,Housekeeping,Safe,,Family rooms,Smoking rooms available,Non-smoking rooms ; English, French, Spanish, Arabic ; Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,L'Mida Marrakech,La Cantine Des Gazelles, ; Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,

title: RIAD SADAKA
address: Sidi Ahmed Soussi, 34, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,La Ferme Medina Restaurant,
near_att: Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,Ma Creation,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,
Description: Welcome to Riad Sadaka Marrakech In the heart of the Medina, Riad Sadaka is located in one of the oldest districts of Marrakech, halfway between the Jardin Majorelle and Jamaâ El Fna square, which you can reach in less than 15 minutes on foot. In the immediate vicinity of the Bab Doukkala gate, it is also very easy to access by car, with a parking lot at only 80 meters. Riad Sadaka, it is five charming rooms distributed around a pleasant patio with trees and offering a heated pool. On the first floor, two lounges, one with a fireplace. The rooftop terrace houses a shaded lounge, a dining area, a relaxation area with sunbeds and a hammam. You have an airport shuttle service day and night, a restaurant offering a tasty traditional cuisine and a team to organize your outings and excursions in Marrakech and Morocco.

Description: Riad Charai is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Riad Charai is a romantic hotel offering air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free internet access is offered to guests.The hotel features a concierge and a rooftop terrace. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Marrakech Train Station (0.7 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.8 mi), Riad Charai is a great destination for tourists.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Riad Charai, including NOMAD (0.8 mi), Comptoir Darna Marrakech (1.2 mi), and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe (0.7 mi).Should time allow, Jardin Majorelle, Jemaa el-Fnaa, and Ben Youssef Madrasa are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RIAD HANAFI
address: Road Bab Taghwout, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Restaurant Naima,chez ahmed,Jnane Tamsna,African-chic,
near_att: Marrakech Guided Experience,Travel Morocco Services,Medersa Ben Youssef,Marrakech Ramparts,
Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Hanafi their guest house of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Riad Hanafi is a budget friendly guest house offering air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The guest house features a 24 hour front desk and a coffee shop. Plus, guests can enjoy an on-site restaurant, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech. For guests with a vehicle, street parking is available.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.7 mi) make Riad Hanafi a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.While visiting Marrakech, you may want to try some burritos at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Roti D'or.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jardin Majorelle (0.7 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.8 mi), or Bahia Palace (1.2 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Hanafi as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

Description: The Riad Zouhour gives you an appointment in Marrakech, in the Mouassine district in the heart of the Medina. Maintained in pure traditional Moroccan style, Riad Zouhour offers an outdoor swimming pool, a solarium, a restaurant area with "homemade" cuisine and a dry cleaning or laundry service. Breakfast and Wi-Fi are free. The multilingual staff is at your disposal. All 4 bedrooms have Wi-Fi access and free internet. Lounge areas, a large and beautiful terrace, a small outdoor swimming pool are at your disposal to rest. Room and room service is at your service throughout the day. All our rooms are non-smoking. Among the services available: hairdryer, safe and toiletries. A free soft drink service is available in the rooms. Rooms are cleaned daily or upon request. Arrival transfers from Marrakech Airport to Riad Zouhour and returns are free for all our guests. A series of excursions with a guide, or the reservation of your golf courses at preferential rates, can be offered on site.

Description: Traditional guesthouse , great charming and confortin the Medina of Marrakech. Located 20 m from the airport and 10 minutes walk from the main square. Recently restored according to traditional moroccan art, the riad has been carefully decorated with magnificent furniture made in the traditional way with luxury carpets & shimering hues fabrics. Riad Nerja's pure arabic& andalusian architecture makes this place an ideal one, made to take advantage of the moroccan peacefulness way of life.

Description: Welcome to Riad Basim, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Riad Basim aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.While staying at Riad Basim, visitors can check out Saadian Tombs (0.1 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (1.1 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a seating area, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the bed and breakfast.Riad Basim features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a sun terrace, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts free breakfast. If you are driving to Riad Basim, there is paid public parking available nearby.While in Marrakech be sure to experience local lobster favorites at La Mamounia, Chez Mado, or Al Bahriya Seafood Restaurant.If you are interested in exploring Marrakech, check out a natural history museum, such as Morocco Hiking.Riad Basim puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Description: Riad Shama is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.7 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.8 mi), guests of Riad Shama Hotel can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.Riad Shama offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The hotel offers a rooftop terrace and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and free breakfast.If you like wine bars, Riad Shama is conveniently located near 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, and Pointbar.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular art museums, such as Photography Museum of Marrakech, The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, and Dar Si Said Museum.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RIAD MYLAYA

near_res: Dar Zellij,Riad Kniza Restaurant,Dar Yacout,La Perle Blanche,

Description: RENTAL in a guest room for a maximum of 10 people, ideal for a stay with family or friends. Riad MYLAYA is a new comfortable and quiet riad located in the heart of the medina of Marrakech. Come and discover the magic of Marrakech! In the heart of the Medina of Marrakech, or more precisely in the heart of the Bab Doukkala district, Riad MYLAYA opens its doors to you with enthusiasm. It is an extraordinary place. Indeed, it combines simplicity, elegance, calm and beauty. All this takes place in a family and hospitable environment. Riad MYLAYA consists of four beautiful rooms, namely: Room One, Orange, Yves and Tarbush. The reasons for these four appellations remain to be discovered on site. Riad MYLAYA is not far from the monuments and main places of the Ocher City: Place Jemaa Fna, Souk, Koutoubia Mosque, Old Medina, Majorelle Gardens ... etc. Riad MYLAYA will take care of your visit project Strategic location of Marrakech. We are not far from the train station and the airport of Marrakech. Welcome....

Description: Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad Anjar, a nice option for travelers like you.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.2 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.7 mi), guests of Riad Anjar can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.Riad Anjar is a romantic hotel offering air conditioning and an additional bathroom in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The hotel features a rooftop terrace. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech.If you’re looking for a sushi restaurant, consider a visit to Buddha-Bar Marrakech, Kosy Bar, or Katsura, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Riad Anjar.Best of all, Riad Anjar makes it easy to experience many great Marrakech attractions like Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam and La Palmeraie, which are some popular parks.Riad Anjar looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

title: RIAD HOUMA
address: Quartier Riad Zitoun Jdid 49 Kaa El Houma, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Marrakech Henna Art Cafe,Tissir Jewellery,Marrakech Tour Guide,
Description: Entirely restored in 2012, Riad HOUMA offers peace, tranquillity and comfort with all the magical charm and authenticity of riad living. It has combined modern lines, comfort, sobriety and with the refinement of an elegant traditional Moroccan architecture. The guesthouse is perfectly located and easily accessible. There is a big guarded car park nearby, the ideal departure point or meeting point to all your excursions, car rentals and taxis. The area is quiet and so safe that you would almost feel at home. The famous Jamaa Elfna Place is only a few minutes away and The Bahia Palace just round the corner. Many other places of interest are also within walking distance.

title: RIAD JOYA
address: Hay Mouassine, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,L'Mida Marrakech,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Riad Joya is a luxury intimate retreat nestled in the very heart of the Medina of Marrakech in the historical and protected area of the Mouassine, just few steps from the Djemaa el Fna square, the main monuments, the souk and the most exciting attractions of the “red city”.A gem of timeless beauty and sophisticated atmosphere, where discrete luxury fuses with eclectic style.The property reflects the traditional architecture of the riads, built around a small courtyard which is an oasis of tranquility, and features two stylish salons and a panoramic roof terrace.The roof top is the best place to savor a sumptuous breakfast, unwind during the aperitif ritual or surprise the one you love with a romantic dinner under the stars.

title: ES SAADI MARRAKECH RESORT HOTEL
address: Avenue El Quadisia, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Las Terrazas De Andalucia,Comptoir Darna Marrakech,Restaurant Red House,So Lounge Marrakech,
near_att: Theatro,VIP ROOM Marrakech,Lawrence Bar,Casino de Marrakech,
Description: Not far from the bustling Medina full of history, in the heart of the peaceful Hivernage and in a 8-hectare green park, the Es Saadi Hotel is at 10-minute walk from Jemaa el-Fna, facing the snow-capped Atlas Mountains. The hotel has a 400m² swimming pool, heated in winter, and an Oriental Spa. The 150 keys' hotel, mainly composed of elegantly decorated air-conditioned rooms with balconies overlooking the pool or surrounding area. Suites and bungalows at the pool are included. 2 restaurants and a piano bar are available to guests. They also have privileged access to other facilities of the Es Saadi Marrakech Resort that are the Casino with its famous restaurant L'Epicurien and its late-dining concept and the Theatro nightclub. It offers free Wi-Fi. Marrakech-Menara Airport is at 10 minutes.

title: RIAD AROCHA
address: 28 derb R'hamna, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: La Table Des Oliviers,O'Square,Highway,La Finca Marrakech,
near_att: Marrakech Kart racing,Adouar Marrakech,Surcoma,Tahanout,
Description: If you’re looking for a romantic guest house in Marrakech, look no further than Riad Arocha.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Mellah (1.4 mi) and Saadian Tombs (1.4 mi), Riad Arocha is a great destination for tourists.Rooms at Riad Arocha provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Riad Arocha Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk and a sun terrace. You can also enjoy a pool and free breakfast. Need a place to park? There is paid public parking available nearby.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the steakhouses, including Autour de la Piscine and Le Bistrot La Boucherie, all of which are a short distance from Riad Arocha Hotel.If you’re looking for something to do, ANIMA Garden (1.0 mi) is a nice way to spend some time, and it is within walking distance of Riad Arocha.The staff at Riad Arocha looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

Description: Riad Alwane is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a quaint environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the guest house.Riad Alwane features a 24 hour front desk, beach chairs, and baggage storage, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a lounge. If you are driving to Riad Alwane, there is paid public parking available nearby.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.9 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.9 mi), guests of Riad Alwane can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, and Pointbar, which are some wine bars that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jardin Majorelle (0.8 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (1.0 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.5 mi), which are all within walking distance of the guest house.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RIAD ZAYANE

Description: Ideally located a stone's throw from the Bab Doukkala Mosque and public transport, Riad Zayane is a magnificent guest house in Marrakech, a five-minute walk from the Souks and fifteen minutes from Jemaâ El Fna square. In addition to its 5 air-conditioned rooms and suite with luxurious mixed decoration, Riad Zayane has a roof terrace with solarium, a living room and a dining room as well as a magnificent patio with two-tone zeligues with a pool and traditional fountain, where you can enjoy a romantic candlelight dinner around tasty dishes typical of the Moroccan culinary tradition, concocted by the Riad's cook. The staff is available 24 hours a day and will help you organize excursions and guided tours of Marrakech and its surroundings, or even book a restaurant table and other show tickets. A shuttle service to the airport will be provided upon prior reservation. Finally, Wi-Fi access is free throughout the building. Paid parking is nearby In addition to its 5 luxury guestrooms and suite exquisitely decorated, Riad Zayane has a rooftop terrace with solarium, a lounge and a dining room, as well as a beautiful patio tiled with zeligues and boasting a traditional pond and fountain, ideal setting for a romantic candlelit dinner over tasty dishes of Moroccan cuisine, concocted by Hayat, the in-house cook of the Riad. Staff are available 24 hours a day and will help you organize excursions and guided tours in Marrakesh and the surroundings, or to book a restaurant and tickets. A shuttle service to the airport will be provided on prior reservation. Eventually, a free wireless Internet is available throughout the building. Charged parking is available nearby

title: RIAD DARI
address: 19 Derb Raouia, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Dar Cherifa,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Rue du Mouassine Morocco Travel Guide,
Description: Riad Dari is a 5 Suites boutique riad, situated in the Medina of Marrakech in front of Dar el Bacha Palace. It is a brand new riad, equipped with all modern comforts, where a touch of Italian taste has perfectly matched with the traditional Moroccan style. The Suites are at the first floor overlooking the courtyard, soundproofed, air-conditioned (reversible) and naturally brightened: they all feature king-size beds (except for the Green Suite with a double bed) with Italian Percale cotton bed linen, lounge and spacious marble bathrooms. All Suites are equipped with mini-bar, Plasma TV-Sat and safe. Riad Dari is a prime location for those travelers looking for exclusivity, comfort and intimate atmosphere, as well as for those looking for a tailor-made stay: we offer transfer service from/to the airport (and full assistance at the airport), guided city tour or excursions with multi-lingual Moroccan guides, cooking-classes, yoga courses and events planning

title: RIAD DAR ALFARAH
address: 58, derb Touareg Ksibat N'Hass, Kasbah - Médina, Marrakech 40008 Morocco
near_res: Mazel مزال Cafe,Zeitoun Cafe Kasbah,La Table de La Kasbah,Le Medina Privilege Riad & Spa Restaurant,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,El Badi Palace,Bab Agnaou,Saadian Tombs,
Description: Located in the middle of the historical sites of Marrakech formed by the El Badi Palace, Bahia, the Saadian Tombs and the Royal Palace, 5 minutes walk from Jemaa El Fna square, Riad Dar Alfarah is one of the more user-friendly guesthouses of the medina. To accommodate your dreams 10 rooms and (2 to 5 pers) combine Moroccan spirit and tradition. A large patio with a pool where upon arrival, Mohamed, Coralie ou Stephan will welcome you personally around a mint tea and traditional pastries. They will be available to answer your questions and help you discover Marrakech. The rooftop terrace has been converted to the comfort of our guests and their tranquility where you will be served a delicious cooking with colors Mediterranean and Moroccan. Breakfast riad is both continental and moroccan, through its various pancakes and fresh fruit juice, by its home made buns and breads, and seasonal fruit jams and by its surprises with milk or fresh fruits, made by Hafssa our cook. It is served on the patio around the pool, in our restaurant or on our rooftop terrace. The menu is an invitation to discover Moroccan cuisine but also international dishes revisited by Hafssa, plus "food allergies" special menus or "children" menu! For more choices, lunches and dinners are booking through our team as soon as possible.

title: RIAD KER SAADA
address: 28 derb el Arsa Quartier Kennaria, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Ker Saada their guest house of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.2 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.5 mi), guests of Riad Ker Saada can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.Riad Ker Saada offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The guest house offers a rooftop terrace, a coffee shop, and a sun terrace, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features free breakfast. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to secured parking.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Asian restaurants, including So Lounge Marrakech, Palais Jad Mahal, and Buddha-Bar Marrakech, all of which are a short distance from Riad Ker Saada.Best of all, Riad Ker Saada makes it easy to experience many great Marrakech attractions like Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa, and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret, which are some popular architectural buildings.At Riad Ker Saada, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

title: RIAD 144 MARRAKECH
address: Derb Sidi Ahmed el Barj No 93 Kaa Sour Sidi Ben Slimane, Marrakech 40000 Morocco

Description: Situated in the historical medina of Marrakech, Riad 144 is an intimate and relaxed full service boutique hotel with only 8 rooms & suites. In this hotel you will also find 2 courtyards, 3 terraces, 2 dining rooms, a winter garden, a spa with hammam and massage facilities and a shop with a selection of exclusive moroccan art. One of the large patio has a plunge pool under the lush palm trees. One of the terrace with 360 degrees view over the medina and the Atlas mountains is the perfect spot to catch the best sunset of Morocco.

title: RIAD SHADEN
address: 222 Derb El Kadi, Bab Ailen, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Café Snack Chinguitti,Riad Al Kadar,Terrasse Café Tanneries,Stalls in the Square,
near_att: One Life Trips - Marrakech,Marrakech Tour Guide Ali,Puro Beauty Nature,Terre d'Eveil Maroc,
Description: Situated in a traditional area in the east of the medina, yet only a 15 minute walk from Djemaa al Fna, Riad Shaden is the perfect place to relax and unwind. The property has a total of 6 bedrooms (2 suites and 4 standard double/twin rooms). All rooms are ensuite, with reversible air conditioning, flat screen TVs, complementary toiletries and safes. There is a spacious central courtyard, a cosy living room and a sunny and secluded roof terrace with sunbeds and parasols. Breakfast is included in the room rate, with additional meals available on request. Cookery lessons are available, which include a shopping trip to the local market. Riad Shaden's staff speak English and French and are available 24 hours a day. They are happy to assist with booking day trips, golf, restaurants and hammams, as well as providing general advice about what to see and do in Marrakech. Riad Shaden's English speaking driver is available for airport transfers, as well as day trips and longer excursions.

title: DAR SHAMA
address: Douar Abiad Circuit de la Palmeraie, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Fogo de Chao,Circuit de la Palmeraie,La Brasserie,La Cantina,
near_att: Mariinski,Musee Mohammed VI pour la civilisation de L'eau au Moroc,Jawad excursions,
Description: There you find 10 rooms and suites of Villa Shama, each colorfully decorated with authentic detail, and also 4 individual suites of the Kasbah, each with their own private pool, you will not lack for anything at Dar Shama. The on-site restaurant is famous for its Moroccan cuisine, you may dine in the garden or by the pool, if that is your wish. There are two outdoor pools and as well the private pools of the Kasbah suites. Dar Shama, where natural beauty and attention to detail meet for an unforgettable experience. The kasbah, also called the house next door, displays harmony between tradition and modernity, comfort of a living room and charm of a pergola, warmth of wood and delicacy of linen. Nestled in a tranquil haven in the heart of the palm groves, away from the bustle of the city center. Dar Shama's splendid garden provides an oasis of combined luxury and authenticity.

title: RIAD PALAU
address: Sidi Ben Slimane, Derb Sidi Maseud, 31, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,Café - Restaurant Bab Ftouh,
near_att: Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,Musee du Parfum,Ma Creation,
Description: Riad Palau is the result of Sonia and Josep Maria's dream, a couple from northern Spain who always had the illusion of owning a Riad and manage it as a Guest House in the medina of Marrakech. Riad Palau is an ancient small palace placed in the heart of one of the most popular neighborhoods of Marrakesh. Two years of restoration held by the best artisans in the medina and the experience and help of our friends Manel and David guarantee that your stay in Riad Palau and in the "Red City" won't be easy to forget.

Description: Riad Al Badia is located in the southern part of the Medina, in the district of Berrima, the district of the storks and the palaces. Riad Al Badia offers six rooms of three different categories, a lounge, a dining room, a patio with refreshing bassin -swimming pool and two terraces. Riad Al Badia offers a Moroccan experience through its hospitality, the opportunity to discover our oriental culture, our traditional and fresh home-made Moroccan cuisine at «La Table Al Badia» but also the traditional Moroccan materials, such as bejmat, zellij or tadelakt used in the decoration of Riad Al Badia and finally, we do provide a daily assistance to let you apprehend Marrakech and Southern of Morocco. Staying at Riad Al Badia is to discover and to experience the genuine Morocco where the "Tailor-Made" service is our daily philosophy.

title: RIAD BIRDY
address: 14 Derb El Baggar Bouskri, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,One Life Trips - Marrakech,Escape The Medina,Boucharouite Museum,
Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Riad Birdy, a romantic bed and breakfast that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.The rooms offer air conditioning and a kitchenette, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.In addition, as a valued Riad Birdy guest, you can enjoy a pool that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to paid public parking available nearby.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Birdy is located a short distance from El Badi Palace (0.7 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.8 mi).If you’re looking for a French restaurant, consider a visit to Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, Terrasse des épices, or Palais Jad Mahal, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Riad Birdy.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.8 mi), Bahia Palace (0.5 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (1.0 mi), which are some popular Marrakech attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the bed and breakfast.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Birdy as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: DAR 73
address: Derb Manchoura, 16 Hay Salam, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,BlackChich Cafe Restaurant,Dar Anika Kitchen,

Description: Welcome to Dar 73, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Dar 73 aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Nearby landmarks such as El Badi Palace (0.2 mi) and Saadian Tombs (0.5 mi) make Dar 73 a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Dar 73 offers guests free wifi.The hotel features a concierge and a rooftop terrace. Plus, Dar 73 offers a pool and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.Marrakech has plenty of Mediterranean restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, which are serving up some great dishes.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular architectural buildings such as Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa, and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret.Dar 73 puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD LUCIANO HOTEL SPA
address: 69 Derb Tizougarine, Dar El Bacha Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Terrasse de la fontaine,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Le Jardin Secret,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Musée de la Musique,
Description: Riad Luciano is a magical place by its mixture between the traditional Moroccan style that we find as soon as we cross the front door with doors of craftsmen, plasters of tadelakt, sculptures on plaster, mosaics and zelliges; and the Italian touch of Monsieur Luciano which is found in the height of the ceilings, the lamps, the living room and in the bathrooms fitted with walk-in showers and bidets. The Riad is located within the Medina, in a quiet street in the middle of the Dar el Bacha district, one of the most beautiful and most secure in Marrakech. The palace of Dar El Bacha and its surroundings are monitored 24/24 by the royal guard. Jamaa El Fna square is a 15-minute walk through the souks and bazaars which are just a few strides away. My Swiss husband acquired this Riad for some time and I just took over the management after renovations / improvements in December 2019. I am Moroccan by birth, having lived in Switzerland for more than 20 years, I take care of the organization and it is for me an honor to be able to offer impeccable and precise service as in Switzerland, warm and generous as in Morocco. I expect many of you in our comfortable Riad where a warm and friendly atmosphere awaits you. Laila Krattiger

Description: The riad Miski is an authentic morrocan riad decorated in a sober and traditional way. Ideally situated in a typical district, you will discover a not tourist face of Marrakesh by being next to storekeepers and to inhabitants of the Medina, while being close to the famous Jemmaa-el-Fnaa square and of the old Koranic school (10 minutes on foot). Our team mobilizes every day to make of your stay an enchanted episode. Be allowed try !

title: RIAD CHALLA
address: Derb Sekkaya N 14 Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,

Description: Finding an ideal romantic small hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad Challa, a nice option for travelers like you.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Challa is located a short distance from El Badi Palace (0.3 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.4 mi).Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Riad Challa makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and a sun terrace. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.Marrakech has plenty of wine bars. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, and Pointbar, which are serving up some great dishes.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular parks such as Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam and La Palmeraie.Riad Challa looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

title: RIAD DAR NAJAT
address: Derb Lalla Chacha 18 Douar Graoua, Marrakech 40000 Morocco

near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Marrakech Henna Art Cafe,Tissir Jewellery,Marrakech Tour Guide,
Description: "Coolest Boutique Riad in Marrakech", Riad Dar Najat is a very intimate Riad with a hot tube Jacuzzi on the roof terrace, 5 minute walk away from the famous and colourful Jemaa el Fna market area, right in the heart of the Medina of Marrakesh. This romantic 4-star boutique guest house has been freshly renovated in 2020 to offer even more comfort and elegance than before.Enjoying a delicious meal or drink on one of our terraces, soothing your body in our rooftop Jacuzzi, or just retiring to the warm, peaceful intimacy of your quiet and well-appointed room. Riad Dar Najat is a proud member of the "Coolest Riads in Morocco" Collection and we'll be more than glad if you try our new luxury guest house in Essaouira,Riad Bab Essaouira ,"Dar Najat's little sister Riad" with the possibility to have a " Marrakech/Essaouira Package Deal ".Cheers,Olli.

title: RIAD DARINO
address: N_7 Arst Ihri - Derb El Boumba, Bab Doukkala, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Riad Kniza Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,Henna cafe,
near_att: Henna Cafe Marrakech,Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,Rue Bab Doukkala Market,
Description: Welcome to Riad Darino, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Riad Darino aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Marrakech Train Station (0.4 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.7 mi), Riad Darino is a great destination for tourists.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Riad Darino offers guests free wifi.Plus, Riad Darino offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, there is paid private parking available nearby.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular tempura restaurants such as Limoni, Les Jardins de la Medina, and Namazake, all a short distance from Riad Darino.If you are interested in exploring Marrakech, check out one of the parks, such as Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam and La Palmeraie.Riad Darino puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD DAR LILAS
address: 4 et 5 Derb Chourafa ex Derb Draoua, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,La Ferme Medina Restaurant,Dar Yacout,
near_att: Salah Excursions,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,
Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Dar Lilas their guest house of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Riad Dar Lilas makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the guest house, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and beach chairs. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is secured parking available to guests.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Dar Lilas is located a short distance from Marrakech Train Station (0.6 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.7 mi).Travelers looking to enjoy some burritos can head to Roti D'or. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Italian restaurant such as Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, or Limoni.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular architectural buildings such as Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa, and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Dar Lilas as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

title: RIAD MAAMORA
address: Dherb Akhlij N. 58 Arset Habous, Sidi Ben Slimane, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Dar Yacout,Chez Abdelhay,dar yakut,
near_att: Salah Excursions,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,
Description: Renaud and Carole, two French young people fallen in love with the red city will welcome you in Riad Maamora and will make you discover Marrakesh and its good addresses(places). Situated at the heart of the Medina, in 5 minutes on foot of the heart of souks, the riad Maamora is ideally situated to discover the city of Marrakesh and its famous gardens of Majorelles. Close friend(relation) of the main places of interest, you will find in only 2 minutes on foot the closest door (Yacout / Arset Ben Brahim) where you can take taxi or carriage. Riad can welcome up to 8 people, it consists of 4 double rooms with privative bathroom and will answer all the expectations(waits) of the lovers of places of charm and authenticity. In family or between friends, the rent of the house exclusively is ideal Riad Maamora is endowed with a patio shaded with its fruit trees, of a refreshing pond, a lounge(show) with a fireplace, a dining room and a panoramic terrace where you can take advantage of the sun throughout the day. We shall propose you naturally of what to quench you, a traditional cooking as reques) and prepared that very day. We shall recommend you of beautiful excursions as the waterfalls of Ouzhoud, one night in the desert, and allof others activities. Everything here invites you in the relaxation and in the well-being. Access to the free WIFI. A service of shuttle is at your disposal if you wish. Renaud and Carole

title: RIAD MAIZIE
address: 95 Derb al Cadi Azbezt, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Votre Table,L'Mida Marrakech,La Cantine Des Gazelles,Cuisine De Terroir,
near_att: Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,Escape The Medina,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Boucharouite Museum,
Description: Riad Maizie was bought by the writer Miranda Innes (author of Cinnamon city) and lovingly restored in the most traditional and exquisite Moroccan decorative techniques like Zellige (hand cut mosaic work) and Gibbs frieze (hand carved plaster work) and is currently run by her son Will Woods who is carrying on that endeavour in a slightly less traditional manner. Less than 5 minutes from the main body of the Souks and 10 minutes walking from Djemaa el Fnaa square, the Riad offers a perfect location to relax after your days cultural enlightenment or haggling for those vital additions for your Moorish corner back home. With the addition of Khadija (chef par excellence) we are also able to provide you with a stunning array of Moroccan cuisines to fascinate and bring intrigue to all palates.

With the addition of Khadija (chef par excellence) we are also able to provide you with a stunning array of Moroccan cuisines to fascinate and bring intrigue to all palates. ; -Family- ; Free parking,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Free breakfast,Babysitting,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Airport transportation,Concierge,Dry cleaning,Wifi,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Breakfast available,Shuttle bus service,Laundry service,Air conditioning,Room service,,Suites,Family rooms,Smoking rooms available,Non-smoking rooms ;   ; Votre Table,L'Mida Marrakech,La Cantine Des Gazelles,Cuisine De Terroir, ; Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,Escape The Medina,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Boucharouite Museum,

Description: Welcome to Riad Dar Nael, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Riad Dar Nael aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (1.0 mi) make Riad Dar Nael a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.Riad Dar Nael is a family-friendly guest house offering air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The guest house features a 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage. Plus, guests can enjoy an infinity pool and an on-site restaurant, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, and Pointbar, which are some wine bars that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Should time allow, Jardin Majorelle, Jemaa el-Fnaa, and Bahia Palace are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Riad Dar Nael puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Description: Set in Marrakech and with The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech reachable within 100 metres, RIAD Redous offers a ticket service, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. A spa centre and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests. At the riad, every room includes a patio. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower and free toiletries. A à la carte breakfast is available every morning at RIAD Redous. The accommodation offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near RIAD Redous include Boucharouite Museum, Le Jardin Secret and Mouassine Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara, 9 km from the riad, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Ce quartier (Médina) est un choix idéal pour les voyageurs qui s'intéressent à ces thèmes : les marchés en plein air, les marchés et les souks. C'est le quartier préféré des voyageurs visitant Marrakech, selon les commentaires clients indépendants. Nous parlons votre langue !

Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Chacha Lalla their guest house of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.While staying at Riad Chacha Lalla, visitors can check out Rahba Kedima Square (0.2 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.6 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Riad Chacha Lalla offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as wifi is available.The guest house offers a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and an on-site restaurant.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Italian restaurants, including Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, and Limoni, all of which are a short distance from Riad Chacha Lalla.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.3 mi), Bahia Palace (0.5 mi), or Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.5 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.At Riad Chacha Lalla, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

Description: Welcome to Riad Aladdin, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Riad Aladdin aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.While staying at Riad Aladdin Hotel, visitors can check out El Badi Palace (0.0 mi) and Saadian Tombs (0.3 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Rooms at Riad Aladdin Hotel provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Riad Aladdin Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace. You can also enjoy an indoor pool and free breakfast. Need a place to park? There is paid private parking available on-site.Travelers looking to enjoy some lobster can head to La Mamounia, Chez Mado, or Al Bahriya Seafood Restaurant. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, or Restaurant of La Maison Arabe.Should time allow, Jemaa el-Fnaa, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Riad Aladdin puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD LAKSIBA
address: 16 Derb Kadi Kasbah, Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le Makassar,Les Jardins de la Medina,Cafe Clock,Le Jasmin Restaurant and Bar,
near_att: Saadian Tombs,Complexe d'Artisanat,Kasbah Mosque,L&S tours,
Description: Tucked just inside the ancient walls of the Kasbah quartier of Marrakech Medina you will find Riad Laksiba a quiet English owned Riad perfectly place for you to discover the mystique that is Marrakech. What do you want to do?• Explore Morocco the genuine way• Immerse yourself into the culture• Travel with the locals• See the natural & unspoilt beauty of this country• Make the journey part of your holiday• A memorable way to discover a country & its people• Get to know like-minded people• A step towards greater exploration• Be encouraged to appreciate a country as it should be seen....make it an unforgettable experience. The standard of our rooms a priority. Clean linen, en-suite, towels included, Free Wi-Fi, safe locations, female friendly and suitable for solo travellers. Riad Laksiba encourages our guests to experience the true environment of the country and therefore works supporting local community. The Riad Laksiba experience is much about integrating into a local community. Our motto "...don't just be a tourist" strikes a cord with most Guests. We also organise Yoga retreats, Cookery based holidays, 2 Center Holidays to Marrakech / Essaouria and also Marrakech / Ourika Valley thus City-Coast and City-Country. We are also planning City-Desert for the more adventurous. We look forward to receiving you and adding value to your own adventure. Simon Hawkesley (Riad Laksiba)

Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Chocolat their bed and breakfast of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Riad Chocolat makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.8 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.8 mi) make Riad Chocolat a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.While in Marrakech be sure to experience local oyster favorites at Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, La Mamounia, or Chez Mado.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular historic sites, such as Medina of Marrakesh, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Chocolat as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.
