title: RIAD DARIA SUITES SPA
address: 186, Derb Chtouka, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Le Medina Privilege Riad & Spa Restaurant,Le Makassar,Les Jardins de la Medina,Cafe Clock,
near_att: Saadian Tombs,Complexe d'Artisanat,Kasbah Mosque,Cactus Thiemann,
Description: We are NOW open (Covid will be a old souvenir for us) Riad Daria is a very charming guest house the heart of the Kasbah in a quiet neighbourhood. Originally an old palace owned by the King's family, it has been lovingly renovated in the traditional Hispano-Moresque style of architectural, retaining many of its authentic features and is now a luxurious riad with five rooms and two suites, and is easily accessed by car. Accommodation 2 suites of 65m2 with chimney place, small dressing room and private patio, 3 spacious rooms of 22m2, each with room for an extra single bed, 2 rooms of 12m2. Riad Daria has two floors: The Ground floor patio-garden with: - A large and light lounge, - A dining room which can be converted into a meeting room, - Two large rooms and a suite with four-poster bed -Two patios, one with splash pool, the other with a fountain and shaded by orange-trees. The first floor with: - Three delightful rooms, two of which are inter-connecting, - A large sunny suite with an open-air cupola, which is covered in the winter, - A television lounge with satellite TV. A very large terrace with orange trees and flowers, and some private spaces, where you can relax and enjoy the beautiful views of the Atlas Mountains and the Koutoubia mosque.

title: RIAD PALMIER
address: 22 Derb Berrima Touareg, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,Zeitoun Cafe Kasbah,La Table de La Kasbah,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Musée Tiskiwin,El Badi Palace,Mellah,
Description: Finding an ideal romantic inn in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad Palmier, a nice option for travelers like you.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Riad Palmier offers guests free wifi.The inn features a 24 hour front desk. Plus, Riad Palmier offers a pool and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, there is paid public parking available nearby.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as El Badi Palace (0.0 mi) and Saadian Tombs (0.3 mi), guests of Riad Palmier can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Chez Mado, Snack Grand Atlas, and Da Rossana, which are some seafood restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Should time allow, Jemaa el-Fnaa, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Riad Palmier puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD DU CIEL
address: 1, Derb Cherif, Rue Diour Saboun, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Terrasse de la fontaine,Le Trou au Mur,Kafe Merstan,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Le Jardin Secret,Maison de la Photographie,
Description: The Riad du Ciel is a late-nineteenth-century Moroccan house which has been restored but keeps intact the features of a traditional riad: it has five comfortable rooms and offers its guests the style, the welcome and the elegance of a private home.The Riad du Ciel is situated in the heart of the Medina, or old town, close to the Medersa Ben Youssef and the Museum of Marrakech, about 8 minutes from Jemaa-el Fna Square. Access by car is easy.As you cross the threshold you leave the lively, chaotic sounds of the Medina, and magically enter an atmosphere of calm, restful peace.The ground floor opens onto a large courtyard or patio, full of light, with orange trees, a pool with comfortable seating and massaging water jets, and a relaxing outdoor seating area complete with cushions - a typical Arab "b'hou".The patio leads into the reception room with fireplace and TV, the kitchen and the Chambre des Etoiles, or Room of the Stars. The walkway leads to the house hammam and to a separate staircase which takes you directly to the Chambre Dorée, or Gilded Room. On the first floor are three spacious rooms: la Chambre du Ciel, or Room of the Sky, and the Chambre du Soleil, or Room of the Sun, which look onto the patio and the Chambre de la Musique, or Music Room, all with private terraces.The second floor has a terrace, one of the highest in Marrakech, with ample space for sunbathing, relaxing and just gazing at the horizon.

title: DAR RHIZLANE
address: Avenue Jnane El Harti Hivernage, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Las Terrazas De Andalucia,Le 6,Epicurien,The Lotus Club,
near_att: Theatro,Menara Mall,Casino de Marrakech,Kech Bowling Bar,
Description: Located at the heart of the Hivernage residential district, Dar Rhizlane stand as private charming house for those looking for peace, serenity and more importantly to see without being seen. walking distance from the ancient historical wall of the red city, Jamaa el fan square and the Koutoubia mosque, you can enjoy from both day and night life. Composed of 15 rooms and 5 suites in two different buildings one built in 1999 and one in 1942, separated by a great landscaping full of lemon, orange, palm trees as well as bassins you can relax in a human size pool and enjoy the magic light. For those looking for a culinary experience, you will be charmed by our Executive Chef Zakya who created over 13 years a real moroccan cuisine with a little twist making of your diner a real "carnival", not to mention that we use our own organic products from our own farm. What else!

title: RIAD NOMADES
address: 56 Derb Chentouf Quartier Riad Laarous, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Terrasse de la fontaine,Le Trou au Mur,Kafe Merstan,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Le Jardin Secret,
Description: Riad Nomades is magical, quiet and authentic. It is a combination of charms and beauty in keeping with the famous medina.If you are looking for good value accommodation, during your stay in Marrakech, we have five comfortable, air conditioned rooms (Tataoui, Berberes, Oasis, Touareg and Sahara). In addition we have our luxury Bedoin suite which is more spacious.The Riad Nomad has two terraces, one of them offering panoramic views of the famous Atlas Mountains which are the gateway to Aït Benhadou, Ouarzazate, the Draa valley and the Sahara desert with the Chigaga and Merzouga dunes. Why not take in the views over breakfast or enjoy some traditional cuisine such as couscous or tajine? For tea lovers why not try a relaxing cup of Moroccan tea under our shady Berber tent?We are situated in a little street in the quarter named Riad Laarous. Although very central this is a quiet location.

Description: Riad Zanzibar is located in the heart of Marrakesh, a 10-minute walk from the Dar Si Said Museum and the Jemaa El Fna square. It offers an interior courtyard with a pool. All of the rooms in the Riad Zanzibar have private bathrooms, storage space and some of the rooms are air-conditioned. Wi-Fi internet access is available in the Riad's public areas and is free of charge. The Riad Zanzibar also offers an airport shuttle upon request and the front desk is open 24 hours a day. It is just 5 minutes from the Palais Bayia and 8 minutes from the Grand Place.

title: VILLA DINARI
address: Alpha 41, Lots Bouazaoui Route Ouarzazate, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,Marrakech Guide Azim,
Description: Villa Dinari is a privately owned British/Moroccan luxury boutique villa just 12 km and 20 minutes from Marrakech. The Villa has eleven rooms and suites which can be booked individually or the whole villa exclusively as a weddings venue, retreat or for private parties. Situated in one hectar of beautifully landscaped gardens, it has a heated swimming pool, hammam and mini spa, it offers beauty treatments room and massage facilities and can provide half or full board. The hotel offers Moroccan cookery classes, has an excellent reputation for Moroccan Cookery and has a real family atmosphere. Running since 2007, the villa has established a reputation as a high quality venue for business and yoga retreats and hosts many weddings and family parties as it is a very safe environment for families with children. Excursions and tours can also be arranged from the hotel. It is the ideal location for dipping into Marrakech or exploring the surrounding countryside.

Description: Riyad El Cadi - an oasis of calm welcomes the sophisticated traveller. Riyad El Cadi is a like a private art museum, but without a trace of stuffiness. Spread over 6 houses, the riad is an elegant 'home from home' - a glorious mix of chic, comfort, hospitality and art. Wander around courtyards, corridors and alcoves and you'll discover magnificent Berber and Islamic art treasures - a true feast for culture-vultures.

title: FAOUZI HOTEL

near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Medina of Marrakesh,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guided Experience,
Description: Located in a picturesque alley linking the Souks Riad Zitoun Lakdim and the famous Place Jamea lafna. Faouzi Hotel 50m from the latter offers you a style respectful of Moroccan traditions. Concerned about the comfort of the visitor, Faouzi Hotel has 27 rooms whose walls are all designed in Tadalakt and with different natural colors; 13 rooms with showers and toilets within the room, 6 of which are equipped with an air conditioner. (The 13 rooms will soon be equipped with satellite television) 11 double rooms with communal showers. 3 singles 4 collective showers Terrace with a tent where you can have breakfast, Moroccan dishes on request.

title: RIAD BAB JANNA
address: 17 Derb El Kouri Sidi Ben Slimane, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,Café - Restaurant Bab Ftouh,
near_att: Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,Musee du Parfum,Ma Creation,
Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Marrakech, Riad Bab Janna is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Riad Bab Janna makes it easy to enjoy the best of Marrakech.Riad Bab Janna offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning and a mosquito net, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The bed and breakfast offers room service and executive lounge access, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features an on-site restaurant.While staying at Riad Bab Janna, visitors can check out Marrakech Train Station (0.6 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Marrakech burritos restaurant such as Roti D'or, which is a short distance from Riad Bab Janna.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jardin Majorelle (0.7 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.7 mi), and Bahia Palace (1.2 mi), which are all within walking distance of the bed and breakfast.Riad Bab Janna is sure to make your visit to Marrakech one worth remembering.

Description: et in Marrakech, within a 6-minute walk of Medersa Ben Youssef and a 7-minute walk of Marrakech Museum, Riad Awatif 36 features accommodation with free WiFi. Featuring a bar, the riad is close to several noted attractions, around 1 km from Souk of the Medina, a 13-minute walk from Djemaa El Fna and 1.4 km from Koutoubia. The riad has an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. At the riad, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Every room is fitted with air conditioning, and certain rooms at Riad Awatif 36 have a patio. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Majorelle Gardens is 1.4 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 5 km from Riad Awatif 36.

title: RIAD EL FILALI
address: 50, Tath Sour el Kebir Marrakech Medina, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,La Ferme Medina Restaurant,Dar Yacout,
near_att: Salah Excursions,Musee du Parfum,Musée de l'Art de Vivre,Fila Excursions,
Description: Finding an ideal family-friendly guest house in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad el Filali, a nice option for travelers like you.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (0.8 mi) make Riad el Filali a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.The guest house features express check-in and check-out, baggage storage, and outdoor furniture, and you can stay connected during your stay as Riad el Filali offers guests free wifi. Plus, Riad el Filali offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, street parking is available.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Riad el Filali, including NOMAD (0.6 mi), Restaurant of La Maison Arabe (0.7 mi), and Cafe Des Epices (0.6 mi).Looking to explore? Then look no further than Jardin Majorelle (0.8 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.8 mi), and Bahia Palace (1.2 mi), which are some popular Marrakech attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the guest house.Riad el Filali looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

The 28 spacious bedrooms, all en suite with their own working fireplaces, are situated around a quiet, beautifully landscaped inner courtyard. All have heating and air-conditioning. The hotel is 10 minute drive from the Majorelle Gardens and 80 km from the Ourika Valley. Marrakech International Airport is 8 km from Riad Zen. Public parking is available nearby for a fee. This quarter (Medina) is an ideal choice for travelers who are interested in these topics: shopping, markets and souks. Description: Riad mahjouba is a guesthouse situated in the old medina (the medieval town in Marrakech) near the souks and the famous Jemaa El Fa Square. The Riad was entirely restored in the pure moroccan tradition with all modern confort. The riad has 8 bedrooms ,all rooms have private bathrooms and are air- conditioned.Our terrace comprises a solarium and relaxing corner and some guests may wish to enjoy their meals on the courtyard or in the terrace of the riad.All staff is discrete yet attentive and will be happy to organise a range of activities on your behalf such as cooking lessons and painting.

title: HOTEL HICHAM
address: 4 Rue Mansour Eddahbi Quartier Guéliz, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Snack Ben Sadiq,Royal Golf Marrakech -Restaurant,Crème Cheese,Snack Dar el Bacha,
near_att: Arabian Fragrances,Berber Cultural Center,
Description: Welcome to Hotel Hicham, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Hotel Hicham aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Mellah (0.7 mi) and Saadian Tombs (1.0 mi), Hotel Hicham is a great destination for tourists.Hotel Hicham features a concierge and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and a lounge, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel Hicham, including Naranj (0.9 mi), Pepe Nero (0.9 mi), and La Famille (0.9 mi).Best of all, Hotel Hicham makes it easy to experience many great Marrakech attractions like Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam and La Palmeraie, which are some popular parks.Hotel Hicham puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD MELHOUN SPA
address: 99 Derb Sidi moussa Quartier La Bahia, Marrakech 40007 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,BlackChich Cafe Restaurant,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Marrakech Henna Art Cafe,Tissir Jewellery,Dar Si Said Museum,
Description: Riad Melhoun is located in central Marrakech, a 3-minute walk from the El Badi and El Bahia Palaces. It features an interior courtyard with a swimming pool and a furnished rooftop terrace with a heated swimming pool on the terrace and a views of the medina. Each room has traditional Moroccan decoration and a view of the patio. All rooms have a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests also have access to a traditional living room with a fireplace and a lounge area with books. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in common areas. Guests can enjoy the hammam and massages at an extra cost. Breakfast is served on the terrace, on the patio or in the rooms. Traditional Morrocan cuisine is also available on request for other meals.

title: DAR AZUL RIAD
address: 93 Diour Jdad, Derb El Makina Quartier Zaouia El Abbassia, Marrakech 40030 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Dar Yacout,Chez Abdelhay,La Palma Cafè Ice cream, coffee and Pizza,
Description: Riad Dar Azul, within walls of the Medina, brings to life the magical authentic atmosphere of Marrakech . It has been renovated in the most traditional style of Moroccan houses.Wide view on the Medina from the roof terrace and a Jacuzzi at the second floor to refresh. Do experience the culture of a country that has maintained the passion for beautiful things with its crafts : tadelact, zellige, bejmat, wood carvings, ironworks, ceiling zouak (painted wood). The style is attentive to detail yet simple and light. the Riad offers also a good breakfast with local specialities, confort for resting after the caotic visits send photos to friends thanks to the free wifi all over the riad, and enjoy the basin with your children. Conveniently located, close to the walls to the north-west of Medina, you can reach the door of the Riad in few steps leaving the car in a guarded parking about 100 meters from the Riad.. We will make our best to make your stay memorable and give you all the to enjoiy your holiday with all useful informations. Bienvenu!

near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: A very special small hotel in an ancient Moroccan riad. With just 7 beautiful rooms, a sky-blue pool and a sun-drenched roof terrace, the atmosphere is relaxed and intimate. Cyril and his friendly team feel like an extended family, serving delicious homemade tagines and creating personalised experiences to help you explore this exotic city. Nothing is too much trouble. Just a 5-minute walk from Jemaa el Fna, l’Orangeraie’s location is perfect, yet it is astonishingly peaceful here, a calm retreat after a morning in the bustling souks.

Description: Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel le Caspien, a nice option for travelers like you.Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV and a desk, and Hotel le Caspien makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is parking available to guests.Nearby landmarks such as Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi) and Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam (1.4 mi) make Hotel le Caspien a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.If you like steakhouses, Hotel le Caspien is conveniently located near Autour de la Piscine, Le Bistrot La Boucherie, and La Grillardiere.Should time allow, Jardin Majorelle and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Hotel le Caspien puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Description: See why so many travelers make Gem Riad their hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as El Badi Palace (0.2 mi) and Saadian Tombs (0.4 mi), Gem Riad is a great destination for tourists.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, a minibar, and a sofa, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.Gem Riad features a 24 hour front desk and baggage storage, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Gem Riad, there is paid public parking available nearby.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Mediterranean restaurants, including NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, all of which are a short distance from Gem Riad.Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a , such as Koubba of Fatima Zohra.At Gem Riad, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

Description: Situated in the Medina of Marrakech, this luxury riad is a 10-minute walk from Jamaa El Fna Square. It has a pool in the middle of the riad and a spa with a traditional hammam and a massage room. Each air-conditioned room and suite includes free Wi-Fi, an LCD TV and a seating area with fireplace. The rooms and suite have a private terrace.

Upstairs you will find a pretty rooftop with one of the highest roof terraces in the medina. title: DAR EL MUDAL
address: 120 Derb Sidi Moussa Riad zeitoun jdid, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,BlackChich Cafe Restaurant,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Marrakech Henna Art Cafe,Tissir Jewellery,Dar Si Said Museum,
Description: Welcome to Dar el Mudal, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Dar el Mudal aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as El Badi Palace (0.3 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.5 mi), Dar el Mudal is a great destination for tourists.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Dar el Mudal offer air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including baggage storage, express check-in and check-out, and a coffee shop. Guests of Dar el Mudal are also welcome to enjoy an on-site restaurant. For travelers arriving by car, street parking is available.While in Marrakech be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, L'Annexe, or Cafe Mama Afrika.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.4 mi), Bahia Palace (0.1 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.9 mi), which are all within walking distance of the guest house.Dar el Mudal puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD DE VINCI
address: 155 Derb El Faran Sidi Ben Slimane, Marrakech 40008 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Lotus Privilège Moroccan Restaurant,Café - Restaurant Bab Ftouh,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,
Description: Enjoy the serene atmosphere of our zen yet authentic Riad. Our team cannot wait to make you discover the charms of the Medina and we will do our best efforts to attend your every wish and make your stay memorable… The Riad used to be a family house. It was renovated in a style harmoniously combining modernity and the best of Moroccan tradition. And its huge roof top terrace has an amazing view on the Medina and the Atlas mountains With 19 rooms distributed over 3 courtyards, the Riad has 3 plunge pools and an attached spa. Located in the northern part of the Medina, a 15 minute walk from the famous Jemâa El Fna square, the Riad is also in a walking distance of all the main touristic sites: Medersa Ben Youssef, the Museum of Photographs or even the outstanding Majorelle Gardens are accessible within 10 minutes. And Sidi Ben Slimane area with its typical shops and local market will let you enjoy the real life of Marrakech and discover the true Moroccan culture…

Description: Monriad is located in the heart of the medina, 10 km from the Menara Airport, 2 minutes walk from the famous square Djemaa el Fna, 200 meters from Bahia Palace and close to the main tourist attractions of this beautiful Imperial city. Free Wi-Fi is available in all the riad. Monriad has been renewed persevering the colors and style typical of the Moroccan house . Each Room has air conditioning & Free Wifi access and Room service on request. There is a little indoor splash pool in the patio, useful to get fresh in the warmest day and a roof top terrace to savor the sunset constantly pampered by the staff. For the winter time our guests can relax in our living room close to the fireplace. In our Riads there are gluten-free, vegetarian and vegan menus. Description: Riad Dar En-Nawat is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.4 mi) make Riad Dar En-Nawat a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, which are some Mediterranean restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.2 mi), Bahia Palace (0.3 mi), or Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.7 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RYAD LAAROUSS
address: 46 Angle Derb El Gueza et Derb Jamaa, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,
Description: If you’re looking for a charming small hotel in Marrakech, look no further than Ryad Laarouss.Nearby landmarks such as Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi) make Ryad Laarouss Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.Ryad Laarouss is a charming small hotel offering air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The small hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and a sun terrace. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech. For guests with a vehicle, secured parking is available.If you’re looking for a diner, consider a visit to Le Warner Marrakech, Fish Kech, or Kachkach Cafe, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Ryad Laarouss Hotel.If you’re looking for something to do, Jardin Majorelle (0.7 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.7 mi), and Bahia Palace (1.1 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Ryad Laarouss Hotel.The staff at Ryad Laarouss looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

Description: Located in the heart of the medina of Marrakech in the Bab Taghzoute district it is the ideal place for travelers who are interested in experiencing typical Moroccan life, open-air markets and souks. Riad 7 Saints is located near the main tourist sites. Very easy to access by taxi or car, which can park not far from the front door. The Riad is characterized by its typical architecture, its calm and by a traditional Cozy decoration. Riad 7 Saints is composed of 6 bedrooms each with its own private bathroom, a sunny patio, a common living room, a dining room, a Solarium and a very beautiful terrace with a magnificent view of the Medina Our team is made up of a manager, a cook, a housekeeper and a night watchman, all at your disposal to make the stay of young and old unforgettable

title: KASBAH ALILI
address: KM 7, Route de L'ourika, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe,Taj Moroccan Food,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,One Life Trips - Marrakech,Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,
Description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Marrakech, Kasbah Alili Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants, Kasbah Alili Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Marrakech.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Kasbah Alili Hotel offer air conditioning and a seating area.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Kasbah Alili Hotel are also welcome to enjoy a pool and a lounge, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.If you're looking for a place to eat, Café Restaurant Bladna (0.4 mi) is a popular option that is within walking distance of Kasbah Alili Hotel.Marrakech is also known for some great history museums, including The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences, and Heritage Museum, which are not too far from Kasbah Alili Hotel.Kasbah Alili Hotel is sure to make your visit to Marrakech one worth remembering.

title: RIAD JARDIN SECRET
address: 43 - 46 Arset Aouzal Bab Doukkala, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Dar Cherifa,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Henna Louaya,
Description: Welcome to Riad Jardin Secret, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Riad Jardin Secret aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.5 mi), guests of Riad Jardin Secret can easily experience some of Marrakech's most well known attractions.The small hotel features a concierge and room service, and you can stay connected during your stay as Riad Jardin Secret offers guests free wifi. Plus, Riad Jardin Secret offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Riad Jardin Secret, including NOMAD (0.5 mi), Comptoir Darna Marrakech (0.7 mi), and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe (0.1 mi).Marrakech is also known for some great architectural buildings, including Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa, and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret, which are not too far from Riad Jardin Secret.Riad Jardin Secret puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: JNAN LOTF
address: Route de l'ourika Km 10 Cercle Oudaya Douar el Harakate, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Palais Dar Soukkar,Bo Zin,Gusto,Pains & Delices,
near_att: High Atlas Mountains,Aqua Fun Club,Tahanout,La Plage Rouge,
Description: More than a guesthouse, JNAN LOTF is a concept for returning to your roots, designed around nature and its pure energy. Rejuvenate! Reconnect to nature and your inner nature. Disconnect from the busy city and the race of everyday life. Change your perception and delude yourself by the reigning serenity and kindness of its hosts. A stay in the heart of the moment where you will find the taste for simple pleasures. An exceptional place, where you will feel 'like at home'. Jnan Lotf, enjoy the luxury of simplicity! Only 10 km from Marrakech, but far away from the stress, noise and pollution, Jnan Lotf - Garden of benevolence - offers a serene break - healing, in an energizing and exotic setting, where simplicity and nature will amaze you. Relax, take your time to breathe. Learn to controle your body and mind, live the moment! Enjoy the luxury of a relaxing stay according to your deepest desires, where you can freely choose your activities and discover Marrakech, its region and its traditions. THE KASBAH – When the walls embrace nature None of Jnan’s constructions spoil the landscape. Everything has been conceived to preserve harmony and the magic of the place. From the service to the warm and refined decor, which draws its inspiration from Africa, its wealth, its simplicity. Without pretentiousness, the kasbah offers an ideal setting for your melas, meditation, yoga sessions or refreshing naps. The Kasbah, star-shaped - ode to the golden number - divines harmony, home to the common part. Downstairs, the dining room and small reading rooms. Upstairs, a lounge - mezzanine where everything inspires serenity and exudes special energy. Here you will be inspired! Read, write, dream, meditate or simply enjoy tea, herbal tea "harmony", you'll have time to let yourself be lulled... From here you have access to two terraces of 100 m2, overlooking the entire property with breathtaking 360 ° view on the eternal snow of Oukaimeden and the valley. THE ROOMS JNAN LOTF was born out of the artist’s desire by whom it was designed, to express his creativity and his natural inclination for harmony. A return to basics, back to the roots, where land and nature have in turn acted as inspiration and materials. 5 ATMOSPHERES Five atmospheres where everything is natural and authentic, from building materials to decorative objects. Everything has been conceived to allow you reconnecting to the energy of nature, while enjoying modern comfort. Facing the Kasbah, around the pool and garden, these spacious and comfortable rooms and suites pay discreetly tribute to the natural wealth of the area: Land of Ourika, Crystal gypsum Cedr'Atlas, Gal'Art, Ethna . Here, everything is naturally beautiful and enjoyable. Energy flows seamlessly, you feel immediately released, refreshed and at peace.

title: RIAD LAURENCE OLIVIER
address: Bab Ghemat Arset Mesfioui Derb Tbib N°82, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Mazel مزال Cafe,Taj Moroccan Food,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,Jemaa el-Fnaa,
Description: Finding an ideal quaint bed and breakfast in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad Laurence Olivier, a nice option for travelers like you.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.7 mi), Riad Laurence Olivier is a great destination for tourists.The rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Riad Laurence Olivier features room service and a rooftop terrace. In addition, as a valued Riad Laurence Olivier guest, you can enjoy a pool and free breakfast that are available on-site.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the seafood restaurants, including Chez Mado, Snack Grand Atlas, and Da Rossana, all of which are a short distance from Riad Laurence Olivier.Best of all, Riad Laurence Olivier makes it easy to experience some great Marrakech attractions like Koubba of Fatima Zohra, which is a popular .Riad Laurence Olivier looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

title: RIAD TROIS COURS
address: 10-11-12 Rue Dar el Bacha Dar el Bacha, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Terrasse de la fontaine,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Le Jardin Secret,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Musée de la Musique,
Description: Riad trois cours It is situated in a ideal location that hold the most charming streets of the historical center in Marrakesh. Riad trois cours was restored in a traditional way and it is a representation of an architectural journey, portrays of historical influences and different cultures. This traditional Moroccan house has hardly any windows towards the street. This ads to the serenity in our vacation house. Once you’ve entered through the large cedar wooden gates, you can leave the excitement of the city behind you. But you may hear the friendly noise of the fountain or the birds in the courtyards. All rooms have doors or windows towards these courtyards. Four charming rooms, and suites decorated With a traditional, Moroccan décor, all of the rooms at Riad Trois Cours feature a fireplace, a desk and a seating area. They all have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower.

title: RIAD BAB LAKHMISS
address: 97, El Berdai Jdida, Assouel, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le Trou au Mur,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Kui-Zin Médina,Dar tazi,

Description: See why so many travelers make Riad Bab Lakhmiss their hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Riad Bab Lakhmiss offer air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. Guests of Riad Bab Lakhmiss are also welcome to enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant. For travelers arriving by car, there is paid private parking available on-site.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Bab Lakhmiss is located a short distance from Rahba Kedima Square (0.5 mi) and Marrakech Train Station (1.0 mi).Travelers looking to enjoy some lobster can head to La Mamounia, Chez Mado, or Al Bahriya Seafood Restaurant. Otherwise, you may want to check out a wine bar such as 68 Bar A Vin, L'envers, or Pointbar.Should time allow, Jardin Majorelle, Jemaa el-Fnaa, and Bahia Palace are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad Bab Lakhmiss as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.The rooms offer air conditioning and a refrigerator, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Hotel Gomassine features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. In addition, as a valued Hotel Gomassine guest, you can enjoy a pool and free breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Hotel Gomassine is located a short distance from Marrakech Train Station (0.7 mi) and Ben Youssef Madrasa (1.5 mi).When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, and Limoni, which are some Italian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jardin Majorelle (0.7 mi) or Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret (0.3 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Gomassine as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

title: AMANJENA
address: Route de Ouarzazate, Km 12, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,Le Tire Bouchon Marrakech,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: Amanjena (peaceful paradise) is located just outside the ancient city of Marrakech. Set within an oasis of palms and olive trees, Moorish heritage is reflected throughout the pisé-walled resort, including the guest pavilions that radiate out from an ancient bassin, echoing the style of a sultan's palace. Amanjena offers a variety of guided excursions on foot, bicycle or private car into the medina, the souk and squares, palaces, gardens and craft shops of ancient Marrakech.

title: RIAD ATLAS MEJBAR
address: Street Elgza, Derb Ezmouri Sidi Bouamar, N. 128, Medina Bab doukala, Marrakech 40000 Morocco

near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Henna Louaya,Salah Excursions,
Description: A haven of peace in the heart of the Medina for a wonderful relaxing stay, "Riad Atlas Mejbar" is located in the old city of Marrakech, just off the souks and close to the Jemaa-el-Fna square. The Riad is a sanctuary for travellers, with dorms, double and single rooms. All of the rooms feature air conditioning and en-suite bathroom facilities. Kitchen facilities are available for your use. Why not relax with a cold drink on the sun-loungers and plan your next shopping excursion to the souks. Attention to detail and beautiful, traditional decoration throughout.

title: ABELIA RIAD
address: 30, Derb Ferrane, Rue Boutouil, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Riad Al Kadar,Bivouac Désert et Montagne,Time Food,Tanji Bar,
near_att: One Life Trips - Marrakech,Marrakech Tour Guide Ali,Terre d'Eveil Maroc,Kounouz Aéroport Marrakech,
Description: Abelia Riad is a guest house renovated in the Moroccan tradition, located in the MEDINA of MARRAKECH, 200 meters from the Bab Aylen gate, also close to the Jemaa El Fna Square and the souks, also close to the golf courses. Warm atmosphere, charm and comfort to discover MARRAKECH in a different way. Around a PATIO with the traditional central fountain where you can immerse yourself to refresh yourself. The riad is composed of : 6 air-conditioned rooms (hot-cold) with private bathroom, private toilet and dressing room. An air-conditioned dining room on the first floor, a living room with satellite TV and fireplace. A terrace from which one dominates the MEDINA with a view on ATLAS and KOUTOUBIA. The rooms are available for the night, the weekend, the week, the fortnight or more. The rate for 2 people per night varies according to the season (120€ high, 90€ high, 50€ low season) and the number of nights, the riad can only be rented for 12/15 people per night, or more. Possibility of an extra single bed in all Suites with a supplement of 25 euros for the 3rd person.

address: Nouvelle Route de Ouarzazate Next to Golf Royal, Marrakech 40000 Morocco

Description: This guest house is located only 15 minutes from Marrakech's city centre and 10 minutes from the main golf courses. Las Palmeras offers comfortable and modern accommodation It is an ideal choice for guests arriving with children. Guestrooms provide you with an elegant and functional living space. They are all equipped with modern en suite facilities. Wi-Fi internet access is available in the hotel's public areas and is free of charge. Should you desire to eat on the terrace, the garden or by the pool the staff will meet your request. Tasty meals and snacks made with fresh produce from the market will be offered. A shuttle with a supplément is proposed from and to the airport and city centre. We speak your language! Bed and breakfast: 13 rooms

title: RIAD LAURIERS BLANCS
address: 156 derb Sidi Messaoud Bab Doukkala - Médina, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Dar Yacout,Oban,Chez Abdelhay,
near_att: Souk Zrabia,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,Zaim Mohamed,
Description: Riad Les Lauriers Blancs is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning and a desk, and you can stay connected during your stay as Riad Les Lauriers Blancs Hotel offers guests free wifi.The bed and breakfast features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a rooftop terrace. Plus, Riad Les Lauriers Blancs offers an indoor pool and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, there is paid public parking available nearby.While staying at Riad Les Lauriers Blancs, visitors can check out Marrakech Train Station (0.4 mi) and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret (0.8 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.If you’re looking for an Italian restaurant, consider a visit to Cafe Arabe, Pepe Nero, or Limoni, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Riad Les Lauriers Blancs Hotel.Should time allow, Jardin Majorelle, Jemaa el-Fnaa, and Ben Youssef Madrasa are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RIAD DAR DIALKOUM
address: 317 Derb Nakhla Bab Doukkala, Marrakech 40000 Morocco

near_att: Henna Cafe Marrakech,Marrakech Train Station,Rue Bab Doukkala Market,Mustapha Blaoui,
Description: The Riad Dar Dialkoum is an adult only Award Winning 4* Boutique Hotel located in the picturesque and authentic district of Bab Doukkala, equidistant with 10 to 20 minutes walking from the main attractions of the medina and the new town. This old traditional house of the late 19th century was restored in the Moroccan tradition and then enlarged in 2009, its a haven of peace in the Medina. Riad Dar Dialkoum includes 3 huge Romantic suites, and 4 rooms. all decorated in different and elegant styles, 2 patios with fountains, one with heated plunge pool, 2 terraces with flowers, trees and solariums, a pergola and , 4 lounges, 1 with Satellite TV, and a dining room. Our Chef will spoil you with the local or international cuisine. We will offer you a variety of dishes with subtle and refined flavors, with the best fresh products from the market. Dinner can be served with candles on the terrace, in the patio, near the pool or in the lounges

Description: Hotel Sherazade is located in the Medina of Marrakech, near to the famous square "Djama El Fna" in a quiet, small alley. All sights of the Medina are in a walking distance. From our roof top terrace you have an overview over the old Medina. In our Restaurant we offer daily fresh cooked Moroccan dishes. The Hotel gives you the choice between 23 rooms with different rates. Most of the rooms are equiped with bathroom and A/C. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. All rooms are decorated in traditional Moroccan Riad style.

address: 264, Ouled Ben Rahmoune, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Le Tire Bouchon Marrakech,Baromètre Marrakech,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,Jemaa el-Fnaa,
Description: Evoking the ancient stopping places of the travelling merchants, the CaravanSerai is symbolic of the other face of Morocco. The interior courtyards and secret corners are inspired by the traditional Berber villages. In luxurious simplicity the 16 bedrooms and suites are decorated in a refined ethnic style. The Hammam, with its tadelakt plaster columns and its great pool subtly lit by shafts of light, is considered to be one of the finest in Marrakech.

title: RIAD POURPRE MEDINA
address: 118, Derb Baba Ali, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Café Restaurant Dar L'hssir,Le Trou au Mur,Roti D'Or,Kafe Merstan,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,Escape The Medina,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Boucharouite Museum,
Description: Riad Pourpre Medina is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.While staying at Riad Pourpre Medina, visitors can check out Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (1.0 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Riad Pourpre Medina is a romantic inn offering a flat screen TV and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The inn features a rooftop terrace, room service, and a concierge. Plus, guests can enjoy free breakfast, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out NOMAD, Comptoir Darna Marrakech, and Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, which are some Mediterranean restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Should time allow, Jemaa el-Fnaa, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

The Villa des Orangers is an intimate haven of peace located near the bustling souks of Marrakech with 27 rooms and suites arranged on two levels around three verdant open-sky patios with water fountains surrounded by galleries of chiseled plaster and a garden.

title: TERRE DE BALKIS
address: Route d'Amizmiz, Km 9 Douar Boughdira, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Terrasse de la fontaine,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Le Jardin Secret,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Musée de la Musique,
Description: As if miraculously placed in a green setting, surrounded by a Terracotta decor, nestled between the small adobe villages of the Amezmiz road and arid stone fields, hides a little corner of paradise...that we would like keep only for yourself. Dominated by the peaks of the Atlas Mountains, far from the tumult of downtown Marrakech, the Terre de Balkis guest house is a charming residence where refinement and serenity reign to live unforgettable moments in Marrakech. The guest house offers 5 spacious and contemporary suites each with a private terrace overlooking the flower garden and the swimming pool. Every morning, a gourmet breakfast made up of local products will be offered to you. Whether you have felt the urge for a solitary escape, a romantic getaway, a joyful family reunion or a holiday with friends, the Terre de Balkis guest house invites you to relax and recharge your batteries in a warm and welcoming atmosphere. . throughout your stay personalized attention will be offered to you and will make you appreciate the intimate atmosphere of this idyllic place.

title: LES JARDINS DE KESALI
address: Route d'Ourika, Km 6.5 Douar Laguassim Tassoultant, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: 5 minutes from Marrakech, on the road to the valley of Ourika, under the splendour of the snow capped Atlas Mountains, surrouded by 15000 sq metres of landscaped gardens, planted with roses, bougainvillea, palm trees and olive trees hundreds of years old. Les jardins de KESALI has opened. All is offered, moments in a life time, sublime and unique.Here we can feel good, touch real happiness, to be far from everything but close to paradise.

near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Rue du Mouassine Morocco Travel Guide,
Description: Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Dar El Assafir, a nice option for travelers like you.While staying at Dar El Assafir Hotel, visitors can check out Marrakech Train Station (0.4 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Rooms at Dar El Assafir provide air conditioning and a seating area, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.In addition, while staying at Dar El Assafir guests have access to room service, a concierge, and a coffee shop. You can also enjoy a pool and a lounge. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Dar El Assafir Hotel.While in Marrakech be sure to experience local lobster favorites at La Mamounia, Chez Mado, or Al Bahriya Seafood Restaurant.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jardin Majorelle (0.9 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.5 mi), or Bahia Palace (1.0 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.Dar El Assafir looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

title: MAJORELLE HOTEL
address: Avenue Allal Fassi No 25, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Pause Gourmande,MyKawa,Cafe Jardin Majorelle Marrakech,La Palma Cafè Ice cream, coffee and Pizza,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,33 Rue Majorelle,Le Musée Berbère,Hadaya,
Description: Majorelle Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge while staying at Majorelle Hotel. In addition, Majorelle Hotel offers a lounge, which will help make your Marrakech trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is a parking garage available to guests.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Majorelle Hotel is located a short distance from Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi) and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret (0.8 mi).Travelers looking to enjoy some tempura can head to Limoni, Les Jardins de la Medina, or Namazake. Otherwise, you may want to check out a seafood restaurant such as Chez Mado, Da Rossana, or Snack Grand Atlas.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Jardin Majorelle (0.2 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (1.2 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.9 mi), which are some popular Marrakech attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: HOTEL RIAD MARRAPLACE
address: 34 Rue Sidi Bouloukate, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,La Cantine Des Gazelles,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Riad - Hotel Marraplace, a nice option for travelers like you.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and a concierge while staying at Riad - Hotel Marraplace. In addition, Riad - Hotel Marraplace offers free breakfast, which will help make your Marrakech trip additionally gratifying.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.4 mi), Riad - Hotel Marraplace is a great destination for tourists.Marrakech has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Chez Mado, Snack Grand Atlas, and Da Rossana, which are serving up some great dishes.If you are interested in exploring Marrakech, check out one of the art museums, such as Photography Museum of Marrakech, The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, and Dar Si Said Museum.Riad - Hotel Marraplace puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

address: Mejjat 3/38 Cercle Ennakhil, Commune J’Nanate, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,

Description: Conveniently close to the beating heart of the imperial city, Mosaic Palais Aziza & Spa, discreetly nestled away in the heart of a green oasis located in the most exclusive recess of Marrakech's palm Grove "La Palmeraie," it is an elegant and serene haven of luxury and simplicity. This five star deluxe boutique hotel offers richly appointed guest rooms, suites, pavilions and garden villas tucked away in 5 acres of lush gardens planted with fruit and palm trees and lined with flower beds tastefully laid out around patios and pools. Harmoniously blending traditional Moroccan architecture with state of the art amenities, attentive service and outstanding facilities created to seduce the discerning traveler.

title: JNANE TAMSNA
address: Douar Abiad La Palmeraie, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: The latest creation of Meryanne Loum-Martin, Jnane Tamsna comprises three houses - Jnane House, Moussafir House and Dar Ylane - with a total of 17 bedrooms within a walled garden. The property is located in a protected palm grove with spectacular views. The houses blend traditional interior courtyard architecture with the space, light and vegetation typical of the Palmeraie. Jnane Tamsa offers a romantic way to discover Marrakech and understand why it has become a legend.

Description: Welcome to Dar Sofil Suites & Spa, your Marrakech “home away from home.” Dar Sofil Suites & Spa aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.Dar Sofil Suites & Spa features room service, a concierge, and express check-in and check-out, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a poolside bar. If you are driving to Dar Sofil Suites & Spa, free parking is available.While staying at Dar Sofil Suites & Spa, you may want to check out La Plage Rouge (1.1 mi) which is a short walk away.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Morocco Hiking, which is a popular Marrakech natural history museum – and it is conveniently located a short distance from the hotel.Dar Sofil Suites & Spa puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: RIAD LARABESQUE
address: 1 Rue El Kennaria, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,
Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Riad L'Arabesque, a romantic guest house that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.As your “home away from home,” the guest house rooms offer air conditioning, a seating area, and an additional bathroom, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a sun terrace, and baggage storage while staying at Riad L'Arabesque.While staying at Riad L'Arabesque, visitors can check out Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.4 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Restaurant of La Maison Arabe, Terrasse des épices, and Palais Jad Mahal, which are some French restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.If you’re looking for something to do, Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.2 mi), Bahia Palace (0.3 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.7 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Riad L'Arabesque.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad L'Arabesque as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: LE PAVILLON DU GOLF
address: Circuit de la Palmeraie Boite Postale 1488, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Fuego Latino,Nikki Beach,Pasta Cosy,Palais M,
Description: Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Le Pavillon Du Golf, a nice option for travelers like you.While staying at Le Pavillon Du Golf Hotel, visitors can check out La Palmeraie (1.6 mi) and Gueliz (3.0 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Le Pavillon Du Golf Hotel is a family-friendly hotel offering air conditioning and a kitchenette in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.If you're looking for a place to eat, Fuego Latino (0.3 mi), Pasta Cosy (0.2 mi), and Asian Bay (0.3 mi) are all within walking distance of Le Pavillon Du Golf.Best of all, Le Pavillon Du Golf Hotel makes it easy to experience many great Marrakech attractions like Medina of Marrakesh, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa, which are some popular historic sites.Le Pavillon Du Golf looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Marrakech.

title: JADALI HOTEL SPA
address: Angle Avenue Echouhada et avenue de Paris Quartier de l'Hivernage, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Gm Cafe Gourmet,Comptoir Darna Marrakech,Restaurant Red House,So Lounge Marrakech,
near_att: Paroisse des Saints Martyrs,Cantobar,Theatro,VIP ROOM Marrakech,
Description: Hotel Jadali & Spa Marrakech is a new urban stopover located in the heart of the Hivernage district, a few minutes from the Medina and the Jemaa El Fna square. This five-star boutique hotel rises over five floors and has 52 rooms and suites, contemporary combining comfort and elegance, they all have terraces shaded by bougainvillea with views. Here, each space is a real journey of the senses: contemporary aesthetics, custom-made and vintage-inspired furniture, noble materials, culinary experiences, panoramic views and sensory universe merge in perfect harmony. In a chic and relaxed atmosphere, Omazonia, the Asian-inspired restaurant welcomes you at any time of the day with a continuous "all day dining" service. As for the spa, Hotel Jadali has a real haven of peace, the Yemaya Spa, an urban oasis entirely dedicated to well-being and equipped with top-of-the-range equipment, over an area of ​​1200 m² and direct access to the avenue de l'Hivernage, the Spa Yemaya skilfully combines Moroccan culture with Thai culture, whether for Moroccan hammam rituals or massages inspired by ancestral Thai practices and provided by the know-how of Thai practitioners, the Spa Yemaya invites you to a deep feeling of calm to promote serenity of the mind.

Description: Palmeraie de l'Atlas is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.While staying at Palmeraie de l'Atlas, visitors can check out La Palmeraie (2.6 mi), which is a popular Marrakech attraction.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a kitchenette, and Palmeraie de l'Atlas makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a sun terrace. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.If you’re looking for an Italian restaurant, consider a visit to VITA NOVA, Le Triarcade, or Ristorante Italiano Casanova, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Palmeraie de l'Atlas.Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular architectural buildings, such as Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa, and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

title: RIAD DOLLAR DES SABLES
address: 13 Derb Deffa Ourbaa Laksour Smarinne, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,L'Mida Marrakech,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Riad Dollar des Sables is a nice traditional guest house of 6 rooms ( 3 doubles, 2 twins and a very romantic Suite for two and can be transformed into a triple with an extra charge ). The ideal location inside the Medina ( 400 meters walk from Jema El Fnaa Square) allows you to explore the city easily. The Riad is located at the entrance of the main Souk,called "Smarinnne" and the famous Square "Jema el Fna" only at a 2 minutes walk. Upon arrival, we recommend you to book our airport pick up, especially by night , to avoid the fake guides; we can also meet you at the Square , or pick you up at the airport, for an extra charge (150 Dhirams :1or 2 guests . So don't hesitate to contact me , giving me your flight details so that I can arrange this service with my private driver.Our driver will drop you at jema el fna Square within 10 minutes, and we will be there to meet you. As soon as you get inside the House , you will be touched by the enchanting atmosphere of Riad Dollar des Sables. The whole staff is welcoming you with a smile, and a special attention : coloured candles, fresh roses petals at your feet, delicate flavor in the air and oriental music..Just to make you feel in the mood and comfortable.Passing through the corridor, you will discover the peaceful courtyard and its fountain made of traditional mosaics.On its terrace, Riad Dollar des Sables offers a relaxing and traditional Hammam ( run with wood) and massages for a very good price;First, you will be invited to share with me (Cathy) a sweet refreshing mint tea and moroccan pastries.As I'm living all year long in Marrakesh since 2006, I know quite well the city and shall be happy to share with you my experience , giving you all the useful information and good adresses to enjoy your stay .We shall give you a map to sign the main monuments to visit or restaurants around. We can also provide moroccan meals at the Riad,cooking classes ( mornings) with my cook Mouna, guided tours in your language with official guides, or excursionsinthe surroundings of the city, body treatments at the Riad provided by professionals only.
Properties: Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Wifi,Free breakfast,Airport transportation,Rooftop terrace,Concierge,Air conditioning,Private balcony,,Suites,Family rooms,Non-smoking rooms

We can also provide moroccan meals at the Riad,cooking classes ( mornings) with my cook Mouna, guided tours in your language with official guides, or excursionsinthe surroundings of the city, body treatments at the Riad provided by professionals only. ;   ; Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Wifi,Free breakfast,Airport transportation,Rooftop terrace,Concierge,Air conditioning,Private balcony,,Suites,Family rooms,Non-smoking rooms ; French ; Bazaar Café,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,L'Mida Marrakech, ; Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,

title: FAWAKAY VILLAS
address: Route Ouarzazate, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Manzil la Tortue,Mes'Lalla,Le 19,Le Namaskar Restaurant,
near_att: Museum of African Contemporary Art Al Maaden,Musee de la Palmeraie,Cafe Clock,Adouar Marrakech,
Description: English-owned and run, Fawakay Villas is where private villa meets boutique hotel. A three and a half acre oasis of tranquility located just fifteen minutes from Marrakech. Escape the bustle of the Medina in one of our three individually styled fully staffed and catered villas plus a garden room and three individual eco villa suites, each one a haven of peace. You'll discover rose-scented gardens, a fabulous heated swimming pool, plunge pools, Berber tents, table tennis, hamman, a roof-top bar and a small shop. Eat when and where you want. The villas, garden room and eco suites are designed for you to be as private or as social as you wish. There are so many features within each that you need never see another living soul for the length of your stay.

Description: Located a 10-minute walk from the city centre of Marrakesh, the Ryad features a spa and offers air-conditioned studios. Guests can enjoy the hammam and the outdoor pool. The studios at the Appart Hotel Menzah all feature balconies and private bathrooms. Each has an equipped kitchenette and a mini-bar. Free Wi-fi is available in the hotel's common areas. Guest of the Appart Hotel Mogador can enjoy a relaxing massage, or sunbathe on the poolside terrace. Appart Hotel Mogador Menzah offers a range of services, such as an on-site currency exchange and a tour desk. The Menara Gardens are 2 km away and the parking is subject to charges.

title: RIAD DU PETIT PRINCE
address: 33, Derb Nakhla Bab Doukala, Marrakech Morocco
near_res: Riad Kniza Restaurant,Henna cafe,Le Comptoir Du Pacha,Restaurant Cafe Regue Jamaa,
near_att: Henna Cafe Marrakech,Mustapha Blaoui,Ma Creation,Souk Zrabia,
Description: See why so many travelers make Riad du Petit Prince their guest house of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Riad Du Petit Prince Hotel is located a short distance from Marrakech Train Station (0.3 mi) and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret (0.7 mi).Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the guest house.Riad Du Petit Prince Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Riad Du Petit Prince Hotel, parking is available.If you’re looking for an Asian restaurant, consider a visit to So Lounge Marrakech, Palais Jad Mahal, or Buddha-Bar Marrakech, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Riad du Petit Prince.Marrakech is also known for some great parks, including Cyber Park Arsat Moulay Abdeslam and La Palmeraie, which are not too far from Riad Du Petit Prince Hotel.At Riad du Petit Prince, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

Description: See why so many travelers make Murano Resort Marrakech their hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.Murano Resort Marrakech is a romantic hotel offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.If you’re looking for a Mediterranean restaurant, consider a visit to Le Blokk, Palais Soleiman, or Croque & craque - Marrakech, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Murano Resort Marrakech Hotel.Best of all, Murano Resort Marrakech Hotel makes it easy to experience many great Marrakech attractions like Jardin Majorelle, Le Jardin Secret, and ANIMA Garden, which are some popular gardens.At Murano Resort Marrakech, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

title: SAHARA PALACE MARRAKECH
address: 12440 Annakhil, Palmeraie Annakhil, Palmeraie, Marrakech 40016 Morocco
near_res: Manzil la Tortue,Le 19,Le Namaskar Restaurant,Mango Zen Pool & Restaurant,
near_att: Musee de la Palmeraie,Musée Farid Belkahia,La Perle Aux Oiseaux,Ecurie Charly Jumper,
Description: Serenely nestled between the soothing Palmeraie landscape of palm and olive trees and the awe-inspiring Atlas Mountains, Sahara Palace Marrakech has been meticulously crafted with a vivid blend of Moroccan, Indian and Moorish themes that unfold from a magnificent Palace block to the four exclusive and expansive Riads. With its five glorious alabaster-white domes resting atop the luxuriant main building, the Sahara Palace Marrakech is regal and resplendent in this breathtaking Moroccan landscape. The hotel unfolds like a beautiful painting from galleries of hand painted frescoed wood ceilings and ornaments, restaurants of rich colours and texture, to the serenity and calmness of the Marie Iod Spa. The high vaulted lobby, highlighted by a sparkling 22 meter chandelier centerpiece and three kilometers of gold leaf adorning various ceilings, cornices, furniture and ornaments, makes this a truly royal experience. This palatial desert oasis features 161 well-appointed, spacious guest rooms, including 25 luxurious suites, spread between the magnificent main Palace and four exclusive Riads. All rooms and suites enjoy stunning views over the Atlas Mountains, the Palmeraie desert landscape or the calming pool and gardens. Our celebrated chefs have gathered the finest ingredients that span the Moroccan, Mediterranean and Indian in one unique destination. Our guests can wine and dine in some of the most stylish and charismatic restaurants and bars in Marrakech, whilst the warm and welcoming service makes every moment memorable. The hotel houses the renowned Marie Iod Spa spread across 3,800 square meters with 14 treatment rooms & two extensive hammams in line with the Moroccan tradition. The spa experience includes dedicated massage therapies, signature Moroccan experiences, personalized coaching services and a full range of esthetic treatments. The Yoga Temple further enhances the overall experience.

title: PALAIS ANTHEA MARRAKECH
address: Km10, Route Ourika, Tassoultante, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Al Fassia Aguedal,La Paillote,Palais Dar Soukkar,Bo Zin,
near_att: High Atlas Mountains,Virtual Room,Aqua Fun Club,Museum of African Contemporary Art Al Maaden,
Description: Glory is the main first impression in front of Palais Anthea Marrakech. Big antique doors reflecting a beautiful sunset, amazing the eyes! The big entry between the trees holds in its horizon a beautiful white architecture sublimated by green nature and a golf course of more than 1000 m². Palais Anthea Marrakech is not only a private palace, it’s more an idea of bringing a convivial spirit to your dinner gatherings, an intimate atmosphere to your parties and most of all : providing you with luxury in all your festive events. As we are convinced that the Moroccan touch is not only a form of art, but incorporates a marvellous kind of luxury and prestige details, we mainly infused Moroccan textures, materials, colours and artefacts in all the palace, bringing to life a wonderful decor and a breathtaking finesse.

title: RIAD LES INSEPARABLES

near_res: Dar Zellij,Chez Abdelhay,Au Coin Du Gout,Coffee Shop Samara Food and Drinks,
near_att: Fila Excursions,
Description: The inseparables, one of the treasures of Marrakech: A unique place, with an authentic original structure, inimitable, rare, where each space is designed to preserve your privacy, even outside your rooms... Experience one of the greatest riad of the medina, you are not cramped, all the space of the inseparable belongs to you on 400 square meters on the ground! The must of the inseparable: Heated swimming pool, dedicated space separate solarium, traditional square hammam, double patio, ornamental pond planted with fountain, massage parlour, café snack bar between patios, restaurant on the terrace, double lounge with fireplace on the ground floor, lounges upstairs So let yourself be tempted, come and discover the magic of the lovebirds yourself!

Description: Sirayane Boutique Hotel & Spa is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Marrakech, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and Sirayane Boutique Hotel & Spa makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including room service and a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.While staying at Sirayane Boutique Hotel & Spa, visitors can check out Mosquée Sidi-bel-Abbès (2.4 mi) and Medina of Marrakesh (2.6 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Should time allow, Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa, and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret are some popular architectural buildings that are relatively easy to get to.Enjoy your stay in Marrakech!

Welcome to Opera Plaza Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.Rooms at Opera Plaza Hotel offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.A concierge and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. Description: Finding an ideal boutique boutique hotel in Marrakech does not have to be difficult. Welcome to M Riads & Boutique Hotels, a nice option for travelers like you.M Riads & Boutique Hotels is a boutique boutique hotel offering air conditioning, a minibar, and a desk in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The boutique hotel features a concierge, room service, and baggage storage. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and a poolside bar, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Marrakech. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.Nearby landmarks such as Rahba Kedima Square (1.7 mi) and Jemaa el-Fnaa (1.9 mi) make M Riads & Boutique Hotels a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from M Riads & Boutique Hotels, including Palais Soleiman (1.2 mi), Ling Ling Marrakech (0.9 mi), and Fogo de Chao (0.0 mi).There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular architectural buildings such as Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa, and Koutoubia Mosque and Minaret.M Riads & Boutique Hotels puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Riad le Perroquet Bleu, a quaint guest house that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.Riad le Perroquet Bleu offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The guest house offers a concierge and a rooftop terrace, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and free breakfast.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Rahba Kedima Square (0.7 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.9 mi), Riad le Perroquet Bleu is a great destination for tourists.If you like Asian restaurants, Riad le Perroquet Bleu is conveniently located near So Lounge Marrakech, Palais Jad Mahal, and Buddha-Bar Marrakech.If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.9 mi), Bahia Palace (0.7 mi), or Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.9 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Riad le Perroquet Bleu as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: TERRE DES ETOILES
address: Kms 25, Commune d_Agafay, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: The Original Camp Agafay,La Pause Restaurant,Restaurant Aziz Desert Agafay,Aziz Agafay,
near_att: Fly Me To The Moon,
Description: Such was the origin of the Agafay desert oasis project : to render to the ground the strength it communicates to me and create an oasis. What a gigantic project to consider greening the desert, surveying nearly 5 hectares of lunar land to cultivate, sow, plant, water and finally create harmony and life. This requires us to work permaculture as already initiated. You are welcome to pay a simple visit or to help in the garden ! The project is a place of co-creation and sharing on this Moroccan ground for the entire human and natural species. This project, I wanted it. Overall, with the whole team that maintain it alive, I strongly intend to share it with you. Each of the 30m² tents has its own bathroom and toilets with Tadelakt, a very comfortable bed, decorated in a moroccan style with Hotel standards requirements.
