Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Riad 1001 Couleurs makes it easy to enjoy the best of Marrakech.Riad 1001 Couleurs offers guests an array of room amenities including air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.The guest house offers a 24 hour front desk, to make your visit even more pleasant. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to secured parking.Close to some of Marrakech's most popular landmarks, such as Marrakech Train Station (0.8 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.9 mi), Riad 1001 Couleurs is a great destination for tourists.If you like Korean restaurants, Riad 1001 Couleurs is conveniently located near GON'S Chicken.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Jardin Majorelle (0.7 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (1.1 mi), and Ben Youssef Madrasa (0.5 mi), which are all within walking distance of the guest house.Riad 1001 Couleurs is sure to make your visit to Marrakech one worth remembering.

Description: Situated in Marrakech, 16 km from Bahia Palace, CASA D' ORIENT & SPA features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a garden and barbecue facilities. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

title: RIAD LA LUMIERE DETOILE
address: 8 Derb Lafkih Sbai Laksour, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Taj Moroccan Food,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: Located in the heart of the Medina of Marrakech, Riad La Lumière d’Étoile is the ideal place to stay between modernity and Moroccan traditions. It consists of three bedrooms and two suites with en suite bathrooms and all furnished differently. The riad offers air-conditioned rooms, WiFi, a swimming pool and a terrace overlooking the Koutoubia mosque. A continental or Italian breakfast is served. In addition to the mosque and the countless roofs of the city, on clear days you can admire the Atlas Mountains which are often covered with snow in winter. Outside the riad La Lumière d’Étoile, the liveliness of the streets and alleys of the Medina awaits you, while inside the hotel you will find an oasis of serenity, peace and a family atmosphere. This area of ​​Marrakech, Laksour is a favorite with our guests: on foot you can reach, in two minutes, the most famous square of Marrakech, Jemaa el Fna. The riad is less than 7 km from the airport of Marrakech-Menara.

title: DAR ZOUAR RIAD SPA
address: 14 Derb Marhouk Bab Taghzout, Marrakech 44000 Morocco
near_res: Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,La Ferme Medina Restaurant,Dar Yacout,
near_att: Salah Excursions,Boutique Stella Cadente Dar El Bacha,KE'CH Collecive,
Description: Recently refurbished by its new owners who decided to settle in Marrakech: Corinne, experienced beautician and Jean-Marc, globe-trotting photographer. Dar Zouar, ideally located in a quiet area of the medina, is a true haven of peace just a stone’s throw from the souks and the main tourist spots of the ochre city. Located in the district of Bab Zaouia El Abbassia one of the oldest parts of the medina, Dar Zouar is ideally located. Just around the Riad, you will find the mythical Dar Yacout Moroccan restaurant, as well as the excellent Dar Zellij or the fantastic Italian restaurant Limoni. The enchanting museum of Perfumes is but 300m away. You can wander through the souks up to the square of Spices through a 10min walk and continue your exploration, leisurely, up to the not to be missed Jeema Efna square.

title: HOTEL CENTRAL PALACE
address: 59 Sidi Bouloukat, Marrakech 40040 Morocco
near_res: Casa Lalla Restaurant,Votre Table,Taj Moroccan Food,La Cantine Des Gazelles,
near_att: Jemaa el-Fnaa,Good Travelling in Morocco,Marrakech Guide Azim,Aux Merveilles de Marrakech,
Description: See why so many travelers make Hotel Central Palace their hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a rooftop terrace, and room service, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hotel Central Palace Marrakech offers guests free wifi. For guests with a vehicle, there is paid public parking available nearby.While staying at Hotel Central Palace, visitors can check out Rahba Kedima Square (0.3 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.4 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.During your visit, be sure to check out one of Marrakech's popular oyster restaurants such as Le Grand Cafe De La Poste, La Mamounia, and Chez Mado, all a short distance from Hotel Central Palace.Marrakech is also known for some great history museums, including The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences, and Heritage Museum, which are not too far from Hotel Central Palace Marrakech.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Central Palace as you experience all of the things Marrakech has to offer.

title: DEMEURES DORIENT RIAD SPA MARRAKECH
address: 10 Arset Ben Nasser, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le Trou au Mur,Dar Zellij,Limoni Cafe and Restaurant,Kui-Zin Médina,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,Le Jardin Secret,Henna Louaya,Herboriste Des Amis,
Description: "DEMEURES D'ORIENT RIAD & SPA" located in the heart of the old Medina, accessible by car, remains open in the East of 1000m2 serene blue sky. Around the vast vaulted patio and flowers, the freshness of its pool and fountain, is arranged the refined elegance of eleven luxury suites. Each one is an invitation to travel in countries of the East ... On the ground floor, the great library, bar and restaurant tadelak with warm colors and three luxury suites open onto the garden. Intimate and mysterious, fun place of water purification, Hammam, two massages rooms have been made in the pure oriental tradition. Access to the balcony of carved wood on the first floor by a large marble staircase and Zelig serving six beautiful suites and a luxury apartment. Finally, the immense panoramic terrace adorned with turquoise tiles opens off the snow-covered Atlas, the Koutoubia and the colorful medina of Marrakech.

title: MARRAKECH RYADS PARC SPA
address: Douar Ouled Benrrahmoun Ouahat Sidi Brahim, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Le Blokk,Fuego Latino,Palais Soleiman,Nid'cigogne,
near_att: Marrakech Tours Guide,Gueliz,Musee de la Palmeraie,Le Vizir Center,
Description: Marrakech Ryads & Spa is home to 260 light and spacious rooms, distributed across 13 riads in keeping with traditional Moroccan architecture. Each air-conditioned room includes satellite TV and a mini bar, plus a private balcony or terrace. With its huge outdoor swimming pool, children's pool and terraces, guests can soak up the year-round sunshine before cooling down with a refreshing dip. For a respite from the Morocco sun, head to the hotel's additional indoor swimming pool or unwind with a cocktail at the poolside bar. The wellness centre offers multi-sensory spas and a spectacular range of treatments. Marrakech Ryads & Spa boasts several sports courts including tennis, basketball and football, plus an on-site gym. The hotel has 3 restaurants that offer a delicious range of delicious dishes: high Moroccon cuisine, a Spanish Tapas and a Buffet Restaurant.

title: HOTEL RIU TIKIDA PALMERAIE
address: Route Fes, Km 6, Marrakech 40070 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Palácio da Bahia,Medina of Marrakesh,One Life Trips - Marrakech,
Description: The All Inclusive Hotel Riu Tikida Palmeraie, completely refurbished in 2019, is situated only 5 km from the old inner town of Marrakech, a vibrant metropolis with approx. 800000 inhabitants, lying at the foot of the Atlas Mountains. It is, together with Meknes, Fes and Rabat, one of the four Moroccan Royal Cities. Our hotel is set within a 65,000 sq.m. garden and is a true oasis of tranquility amidst the local hustle and bustle. The location is ideal due to its proximity to Marrakech-Menara Airport (RAK) is approx. 13 km away. The hotel has 392 comfortably furnished rooms and offers many amenities. 1 outdoor pool, 1 children’s and 1 indoor pool. For the youngest guests, there is the RiuLand Kids Club (for children from 4 to 7 years & 8 to 12 years old), RiuArt atelier and for adults, day and evening entertainment. For lovers of gastronomy, we offer live cooking stations at our main buffet as well as Moroccan and Italian cuisine, 3 bars situated in various areas of the hotel.

title: KENZI MENARA PALACE
address: Avenue Mohammed VI Zone de l’Agdal, Marrakech 40020 Morocco
near_res: Al Fassia Aguedal,Gusto,Pains & Delices,Nommos,
near_att: Virtual Room,la boutique photo,555 Famous Club,Almazar Centre Commercial,
Description: The blend of an Arabo-Moorish architectural style with a generous 10 acres park and gardens makes the Kenzi Menara Palace & Resort your haven of peace and tranquility. The Kenzi Menara Palace is a luxury hotel located in a peaceful, 10-acre park in Marrakech just 10 minutes from the medina by free shuttle. The hotel offers accommodation mixing harmoniously the Moroccan style and a modern touch. Guestrooms are comfortable and have a balcony offering a staggering view facing the Atlas mountains. The international restaurant "Terrasse de l'Insensé" and the specialty restaurant "L'Insensé" serve quality cuisine and a different dining sensation and satisfy all tastes. There is also a traditional Moroccan restaurant, poolside snack bar, piano bar, and room service. The hotel offers various activities including tennis, volleyball, badminton, and a swimming pool. The Kids Club is supervised by professionals and gives children the opportunity to discover the Moroccan culture through fun and educational activities. The Spa by Terraké invites guests to relax. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi internet access, free on-site parking, and a free shuttle to the city center.

title: HOTEL AMIRA VACANCES

Description: If you’re looking for a budget friendly guest house in Marrakech, look no further than Hotel Amira & Vacances.While staying at Hotel Amira & Vacances, visitors can check out Rahba Kedima Square (0.1 mi) and El Badi Palace (0.6 mi), some of Marrakech's top attractions.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the guest house.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Autour de la Piscine, Le Bistrot La Boucherie, and La Grillardiere, which are some steakhouses that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Should time allow, Jemaa el-Fnaa, Bahia Palace, and Ben Youssef Madrasa are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.The staff at Hotel Amira & Vacances looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

title: RIAD SPA ESPRIT DU MAROC
address: 14 Derb Belbekkar Zaouit Lhardar zaouit Lhardar, Marrakech 40030 Morocco
near_res: L'Mida Marrakech,Café Restaurant Dar L'hssir,Terrasse de la fontaine,Le Trou au Mur,
near_att: Medina of Marrakesh,Escape The Medina,The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech,Boucharouite Museum,
Description: The Riad & SPA Esprit du Maroc is one of those architectural jewels that are increasingly rare to find today in Morocco. Dating from the 18th century, it is composed of 3 patios, very well preserved, in the heart of the old Medina, in an old district of noble families, the Zaouit Lhardar district, where the Medersa Ben Youssef is located, the museum of Marrakech , the Koranic school, Dar El Bacha… Only 10 minutes from the Jemaa el Fna square on foot, it will be easy for you to access the main tourist attractions for which Marrakech is famous. Doors and ceilings painted in traditional Zouac, old Fez zelliges, colored stucco, furniture, bodyguards, wrought iron windows, everything is period and in an astonishing state of preservation. The manager Sylvie knew how to make it a real charming palace, by offering spacious and refined rooms, with a decoration combining conservatism and modernity, services worthy of the big names in the hotel industry, a professional SPA of 200 square meters including 5 rooms massages, a Hammam, a fitness room… The Riad offers for its customers, and for customers outside the Riad, traditional top-of-the-range catering, at a very reasonable price. The 800 square meter terrace with a view of the Atlas will be ideal for sunbathing, eating, participating in evening events, or simply enjoying the spectacle offered by Marrakech at sunset. The fame of the ocher city will then take on its full meaning. It will be very difficult for you to want to leave the Riad & SPA Esprit du Maroc. It is in places such as the Riad & SPA Esprit du Maroc, that one can still find the charm of yesteryear of Morocco, and become prince or princess, the time of a stay worthy of the thousand and one nights.

title: HOTEL RYADS BARRIERE LE NAOURA MARRAKECH
address: Rue Djebel Alakhdar Bab Doukala, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Gastro MK at Maison MK,Chez Yassine,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Rue du Mouassine Morocco Travel Guide,
Description: See why so many travelers make Hotel & Ryads Barriere Le Naoura Marrakech their hotel of choice when visiting Marrakech. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Marrakech, Hotel & Ryads Barriere Le Naoura Marrakech is located a short distance from Marrakech Train Station (0.5 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (0.6 mi).Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and Hotel & Ryads Barriere Le Naoura Marrakech makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge and room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.If you like seafood restaurants, Hotel & Ryads Barriere Le Naoura Marrakech is conveniently located near Chez Mado, Da Rossana, and Snack Grand Atlas.If you’re looking for something to do, Jardin Majorelle (1.0 mi), Jemaa el-Fnaa (0.5 mi), and Bahia Palace (0.9 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Hotel & Ryads Barriere Le Naoura Marrakech.At Hotel & Ryads Barriere Le Naoura Marrakech, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Marrakech.

Le Domaine de l'Ourika creates a peaceful environment situated only a few kilometers from the exciting city center of Marrakech. Welcome to Royal Decameron Issil, a nice option for travelers like you.Rooms at Royal Decameron Issil Hotel offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free internet access.A concierge is one of the conveniences offered at this inn. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Royal Decameron Issil, free parking is available.Nearby landmarks such as Ben Youssef Madrasa (1.5 mi) and Rahba Kedima Square (1.9 mi) make Royal Decameron Issil Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Marrakech.While in Marrakech, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Royal Decameron Issil Hotel, including Ling Ling Marrakech (1.0 mi), Fogo de Chao (0.3 mi), and Patisserie Belkabir Medina (1.1 mi).If you’re looking for something to do, La Palmeraie (0.7 mi) is a nice way to spend some time, and it is within walking distance of Royal Decameron Issil Hotel.Royal Decameron Issil puts the best of Marrakech at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: TUI BLUE MEDINA GARDENS
address: Arset Djnan La Khdar, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Bazaar Café,Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Gastro MK at Maison MK,
near_att: Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,Henna Cafe Marrakech,Ensemble Artisanal,Koutoubia Mosque,
Description: Situated in the heart of Marrakesh 5 minutes walking from Jemaa El Fna square, ideal for couples desiring to soak up the charm of Marrakesh, most attractions are within walking distance, including the Palace Bahia, the Koutoubia Mosque, the Gueliz and the Majorelle Gardens. Spectacular views of the Atlas Mountains, the minaret of the Koutoubia and a lush garden of three hectares. This property combines modern comfort and traditional Moroccan accents. Our rooms and suites, carefully designed for the comfort of a luxury accommodation in Marrakesh. They are equipped with an LCD 32 inch TV with a wide selection of international channels, direct dial telephone, air conditioning / heating, mini bar (water and soft drinks), safe and free WiFi connection. The hotel includes 3 restaurants: Buffet Restaurant: a space resolutely modern design, a cuisine with miles and flavor in a warm atmosphere. Snack Restaurant: open only during lunch time. The Culinarium (A La Carte Restaurant): For an exceptional culinary experience, open only for dinner time. Dress code is to be followed : in the common areas no swimsuits in the covered areas (Lobby, restaurant, Lobby Bar and Lounge Bar). Restaurant at dinner: long trousers for the gentlemen, no casual flip-flops, no sportswear. The hotel Spa and pools invite to regenerate in peace, while the fitness center allows you to keep in shape. The property also boasts two tennis clay courts, ping pong table, escape room.

title: LES JARDINS DE ZYRIAB RESORT SPA
address: Km 13 Route De L'Ourika Canal De Zaraba, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Café Restaurant Bladna,La Villa Oscar,Fellah Hotel Restaurant,La Plage Rouge,
near_att: High Atlas Mountains,Aqua Fun Club,La Plage Rouge,Equi-z By La Vie En Rose Marrakech,
Description: A place plentiful of dreams and exoticism, Marrakech is distinguished with its unique climate, its millinery history and hospitality tradition. Once you have passed through the gates of Les Jardins de Zyriab, you will be overwhelmed by a warm and convivial atmosphere in a place where beauty prevails. Its architecture at the same time traditional and contemporary and its perspectives ingeniously conceived, offer it a particular dimension where each one of us feels at home. Submerging in the heart of 7000 m², planted with olive trees, orange trees, pomegranate trees, bougainvillea, palm trees... and designed in the most authentic Moorish style with its creek pouring in a 25 m long pool, 20 exceptional and independent suites that have each a breathtaking view over the Atlas Mountains and assure a total intimacy to its guests.

title: RIAD MBOJA CHEZ ALI BABA

near_res: Ma Maison,La Table Du Riad at 72 Riad Living,Riad Kniza Restaurant,Henna cafe,

Description: My Riad is ideally located equidistant between the heart of the Medina (Jemaa El Fna) and the center of the new city (Gueliz). I'm the new Managing Partner since 01st June 2015, and my ambition is to bring you the best during your stay with us. Bedding for rooms carefully chosen, to bring you more comfortable and articles bathrooms to.Personal greeting by me is the strong point throughout your stay, I am permanently present at the Riad and we can talk in English, Spanish and Italian, French ofcourse.... My priority throughout your stay is your comfort as well than outside and inside the Riad. The car access is a few seconds of the Riad and bus station serving all of the Kingdom of Morocco at 5 minutes walking. The Mboja riad has six rooms to 01st and 02nd floor, all equipped with air conditioning, a safe, a Morocco Telecom GSM is also available throughout your stay. A personalized service ensures you a stay that will be made only at your own pace, which is my priotrity. A little swimming pool located in an alcove of the patio, will bring you well-being and privacy. The double terrace and lounge will welcome you for moments of relaxation in privacy. You will have a panoramic view of Marrakech and the Atlas. Your happiness is my goal, your satisfaction my pride.

Description: Marrakech is the Southern pearl, full of charm, mystery and bustle, at the crossroads of the Sahara and the High Atlas. The Club Med Village, set in Morocco's oldest palm grove, reflects the intimate aspect of the medina, fostering its way of life with its gardens, refined cuisine and warm welcome. The Marrakech architecture combines baked bricks, tadelakt, red ochre and colourful zellige, to create a relaxing haven to which you can enjoy returning after a stroll through Djemaa el-Fna square.

title: VILLA ATIKA MAISON DHOTES SPA
address: Km 13 Route de Fes, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Manzil la Tortue,Le Namaskar Restaurant,Mango Zen Pool & Restaurant,Amanjena Arva Italian Restaurant,
near_att: La Perle Aux Oiseaux,Ecurie Charly Jumper,
Description: Looking for a place to stay in Marrakech? Then look no further than Villa Atika, a hotel that brings the best of Marrakech to your doorstep.Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Villa Atika offer air conditioning.Guests of Villa Atika are also welcome to enjoy a pool and free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.Travelers looking for French restaurants can head to Manzil la Tortue or Cafe Restaurant Chez l'Habitant.There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular art museums such as Photography Museum of Marrakech, The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech, and Dar Si Said Museum.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Villa Atika as you experience everything Marrakech has to offer.

title: LABRANDATARGA CLUB AQUA PARC
address: Douar Bouchareb, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Pointbar,Patisserie Gato,Gm Cafe Gourmet,
near_att: Jardin Majorelle,Marrakech Guided Experience,Marrakech Urban Adventures,Dar El Bacha - Musee des Confluences,
Description: LABRANDA Targa Club Aqua Parc is a 4* hotel located in Marrakesh and is within close proximity of both airport ( 12 KM) & down town (10 KM). Hotel offers Aqua Park with 4 water slides , 5 swimming pools & 1 relaxing adult only pool, catering to the needs of both families & couples. Hotel operates daily FREE SHUTTLE SERVICE to 2 different locations, Down Town & the OLD CITY (MADINAH) with all its history & traditional Moroccan culture, prior reservations for the shuttle bus is a must. Extensive gardens & greenery with many planted olive trees & palm trees within a premises of over 50,000 M2. A panoramic view of the Atlas Mountains can be seen. Hotel has a total of 239 rooms & suites, as well as a mini club with indoor & outdoor extended activities & kids pool fully supervised by specialized kids animators. Main restaurant, 1 A La Carte Moroccan Restaurant & 3 bars available with daily extensive evening entertainment.

title: RADISSON BLU HOTEL MARRAKECH CARRE EDEN
address: 166-176 Avenue Mohamed, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Dameh,Patisserie Gato,Le Tire Bouchon Marrakech,Baromètre Marrakech,
near_att: MACMA Musee d'Art et de Culture de Marrakech,Kech adventures,Galerie Bertrand,Créazen Spirit,
Description: Set in the heart of Marrakech, this hotel in the Gueliz quarter lets visitors experience this Moroccan city's modern bustle. Part of the newly built Carré Eden complex, the 5-star Radisson Blu Hotel provides immediate access to the complex's internationally recognized stores and restaurants as well as the trendy nightlife nearby. Designed by famous architect Imaad Rahmouni, this modern Marrakech hotel features a beautiful lobby, patio and restaurant. It's a striking contrast to the city's historical quarter located just 10 minutes away, where guests can explore the Djemaa El-Fna square and traditional souks. Our 198 rooms and suites exude a soothing, contemporary vibe, created by designers Lotfi Sidi Rahal and Meriem Benkirane. Guests enjoy modern amenities like Free high-speed, wireless Internet access and LED television with satellite channels. The on-site restaurant, lounge and bar create a unique open venue, where guests can enjoy tapas, sushi or savory organic meat and fish prepared on a charcoal grill. The hotel's facilities include an aquarium swimming pool surrounded by a spacious patio with sunbeds, a spa, a fitness center, and an event space comprising 10 commodious meeting rooms for business and private events.

You will appreciate the blue sky from Riad Blanc, the wonderfull view of the Atlas mountain from Dar Tiwaline, the best Indonesian massages and large terrasse from our Riad Bab Ferdaous, the famous restaurant Angsana Si Said in the heart of our Flagship Riad Si Said, the pool and the cosy confort of our Riad Lydines, and last but not least the green and surprising atmosphere our Riad Dar Zaouia As you admire the intricate zellij or mosaic tiles surrounding you, take comfort that your stay will be an unforgettable one. title: DAR LES CIGOGNES BY SANSSOUCI COLLECTION
address: 108 Rue De Berima, Marrakech 40000 Morocco
near_res: Mazel مزال Cafe,Restaurant Angsana Si Said,Le Medina Privilege Riad & Spa Restaurant,Dar Anika Kitchen,
near_att: Palácio da Bahia,Musée Tiskiwin,El Badi Palace,Miaara Jewish Cemetery,
Description: Dar Les Cigognes is a luxurious boutique hotel centrally located in the heart of the medina of Marrakech. An oasis of calm in a dazzling city, relax and enjoy our hammam, have a massage, or an unforgettable meal. The view from the roof terraces to the Atlas Mountains and onto the palace ramparts is unforgettable. Opposite royal palace, parking, 11 rooms and suites, fireplaces, AC.
